name: Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza
address: Carrer Des Botafoc, 2, 07850 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza has a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Cala Llenya. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, karaoke and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. At Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast. Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis and tennis at this 4-star hotel, and car hire is available. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Cala Llenya Beach, Cala Mastella Beach and Cala Nova Beach. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 29 km from Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza.

name: Hacienda Na Xamena, Ibiza
address: Urbanizacion na Xamena Buzon 11, 07815 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Offering amazing sea views from its clifftop position and from its stylish rooms, this impressive hotel is located in Na Xamena, on Ibiza’s north coast. It offers a spa, a gym, tennis court and 3 swimming pools. Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena’s spa has indoor and outdoor areas, including the Suspended Waterfalls Thalassotherapy Circuit which offers fantastic views. There is a massage area located in a bamboo hut which faces the sunset in the west. The Na Xamena has 2 restaurants, including a poolside bar that serves snacks and drinks for informal all-day dining, and a very chic Mediterranean-inspired space with terraces on various levels overlooking the sea. The bright, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom. All have a private hot tub and many have a mini-pool looking out over the Mediterranean Sea. There is a 24-hour reception and staff can provide information about what Ibiza has to offer, and they can help to arrange transport, car rental and reservations at restaurants or nightclubs. You can drive to Ibiza Town in 30 minutes from Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena, and Sant Antoni de Portmany is 35 minutes away. Es Canar, with its famous hippy market, is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: The Ibiza Twiins Hotel
address: Avenida Pedro Matutes Noguera - Playa d'en Bossa, 07800 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Ibiza Twiins is an innovative concept, looking for its customers to explore and discover the island of Ibiza through the senses. The different areas in this complex are the experiences at your disposal content of great tourist interest and cultural heritage through technology. It consists of Joy and Life, two twin buildings with spacious and comfortable rooms elegantly decorated. Every corner of Joy marks the character, the joy of the island and the essence of the Mediterranean with a gastronomy full of Bio proposals. The personality of life is reflected in an elegant and modern environment that envelops customers in an exclusive atmosphere where experiences will become their identity.Sembo

name: Stic Urban Hotel & Spa
address: San Antonio, 30, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in San Antonio and with San Antonio Beach reachable within 600 metres, Stic Urban Hotel & SPA features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a tour desk. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Stic Urban Hotel & SPA have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Stic Urban Hotel & SPA. The hotel offers a spa centre. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. Popular points of interest near Stic Urban Hotel & SPA include Calo des Moro Beach, Es Pouet Beach and San Antonio Port. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Grand Palladium Palace Ibiza Resort & Spa
address: Ctra. Playa D'en Bossa 7, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Located in Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Grand Palladium Palace Ibiza Resort & Spa is a 1-minute drive from Bossa Beach and 8 minutes from Las Salinas Beach. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza
address: Carretera Playa D'en Bossa 10, 07817 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza is located right on the beachfront in Playa d'en Bossa. This modern hotel has a large open-air stage hosting prestigious weekly concerts. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. This large hotel has 2 outdoor pools and a spa with a hot tub and sauna, as well as a gym. There is also an exclusive private beach club with beach bar next to the hotel, and a range of chill-out areas. Hard Rock Ibiza is decorated with a range of music memorabilia. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The windows also have blackout curtains. There are 6 on-site restaurants and various bars. The hotel also offers a venue for teenagers, and there is an entertainment programme for children. Ibiza Airport is just 7 minutes' drive from Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza.

name: Els Pins Resort and Spa
address: Carrer Des Calo, 07820 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Facing the beachfront, Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels offers 4-star accommodation in San Antonio Bay and features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden and shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain rooms at Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels also offer a sea view. At the accommodation each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels. The hotel offers a terrace. You can play table tennis and tennis at Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cala Pinet Beach, Playa de Pinet and Es Pouet Beach. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 16 km from Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels.

name: Hotel Simbad
address: Ses Figueres 22, Talamanca, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set on the beach in Talamanca Bay, 3 km from Ibiza Town, this hotel offers an outdoor pool with sea views. There is a free spa with a gym and hot tub. All Hotel Simbad Ibiza rooms have air conditioning and satellite TV. Most have balconies with sea views, and there is free WiFi throughout. The private bathroom comes with amenities, and you can rent the safe. Simbad Ibiza has 2 restaurants. One offers an à la carte menu and the other serves a buffet-style breakfast and dinner. There are also 2 bars with terraces, offering panoramic views of the bay. Free sun loungers and parasols are available at the Simbad’s large outdoor pool area. The spa includes a sauna and indoor pool. There is a 24-hour front desk. The Simbad has a tour desk, where you can rent a car, and free on-site parking is offered.

name: Camelina Suites
address: Carrer Valencia, 4, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Torrent Bay Club is just 100 metres from the beautiful Port des Torrent Beach and 5 km from San Antonio. It offers an outdoor pool for adults, an outdoor pool for children and bright air-conditioned apartments with a private balcony. Free WiFi is provided. The Torrent Bay apartments feature tiled floors and smart décor. Each one has a seating area with sofas and satellite TV, as well as a kitchenette with a microwave and coffee-maker. There is a large garden with loungers and a children’s playground. The complex also has table tennis facilities. There is a restaurant that serves snacks and breakfast daily. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Ibiza. You can also hire a car or bicycle on site. You will find other amazing beaches nearby. You can drive to Cala Bassa in 5 minutes and to Cala Tarida in 10 minutes. Ibiza Town is around 20 minutes' drive from the property.

name: Ibiza Sun Apartments
address: Deessa Tanit, 3, 07817 Platja d'en Bossa
description: Located 200 metres from Playa d’en Bossa Beach, Ibiza Sun Apartments features 2 outdoor swimming pools, a hot tub and a bar. Ibiza Town is 3 km away. Suites at Sun Ibiza have air conditioning and feature modern minimalist décor. There is a living room with a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, and a kitchenette. Free WiFi is included. On site you will find SunThai restaurant, a chill out terrace with loungers and sunshades, and the Sun Wellness area. Staff at the 24-hour reception can arrange several activities. Sun Ibiza Apartments is close to Ushuaia and Ibiza’s most popular nightclubs and bars. Ibiza Airport is just 3 km away.

name: Grand Palladium White Island Resort & Spa
address: C/ Playa d'en Bossa, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Located halfway between the airport and Ibiza city, this magnificent beachfront resort is ideally located in Playa d'en Bossa, offering a quiet and peaceful setting, but yet close enough to the most avant-garde and fashionable district of the area. With its spacious and tastefully decorated guest rooms and a world-class spa offering exclusive beauty treatments, the establishment is a perfect place for those seeking a relaxing holiday, full of luxury, in a beautiful environment. When it comes for dining and wining, guests will be spoilt for choice by the huge variety of restaurants and bars offered by the hotel, which serve delicious local and international specialities. From lying on the beach or enjoying the hot tub of the outdoor swimming pool to practice sport activities and different games, the hotel features a wide range of facilities that will entertain both adults and children.FarePortal

name: Hotel Rural Xereca
address: 7813 C/Torrent, Puig D`En Valls Santa Eulalia Del Rio, 07819 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Xereca is situated in Puig den Valls, 3.2 km from Ibiza Town. The pet-friendly hotel has an outdoor pool and sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the snack bar. Nearly all rooms and suites have a private terrace or balcony with views to the garden or pool area. All rooms have a private bathroom with extras as hairdryer, free toiletries, bathrobes as well as flat screen TV, minibar and coffeemachine. Bike hire and car hire are available at this farm stay and the area is popular for golfing. The area is popular for boattrips and watersports. Located very quiet but very good connected Salinas Beach is just 8 km away, Playa den Bossa 5 km, San Antonio 12 km and Ibiza Airport 8 km. Airport shuttle services are available on prior request, and subject to availability.

name: Hotel Riomar, Ibiza, A Tribute Portfolio Hotel
address: C/ Del Río, 48, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Where the river meets the sea, a place of natural wonder from which energies are channeled. Ocean Brasserie & Bar, lounge and terrace, is a place to immerse amongst a community of leisure, making for an affirmed connection to life under the sun. Relax at the Pool Deck or with a morning yoga session in TRIBE, our secret garden. Hotel Riomar Ibiza is another world, where dreams are fueled and inspiration is found. A residence for ideas and a place where community evolves.Marriott

name: Can Vistabella Boutique Resort
address: Camino de Benimusa, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Set within gardens, Can Vistabella Boutique Resort has been fully renovated in 2019 and features a swimming pool surrounded by a sun terrace and loungers. All accommodation features a terrace and free WiFi. Free parking is available on-site. Can Vistabella Boutique Resort is located up on a hill, with views over Portmany Bay and is a short drive to the beach. Rooms include coffee maker, fridge, and kettle. Some rooms include a flat-screen TV in the living room, which leads to the terrace; and a kitchen fitted with electric cooker. Bungalows offer a lounge-dining room with double sofa bed. Other facilities at the property include a restaurant and bar, located by the pool, a yoga deck and outdoor cinema. The property also offers massage and beauty treatments. Ibiza Airport is approximately 22 km from Can Vistabella Boutique Resort. Many bars and restaurants as well as popular clubs are a 5-minute drive away.

name: Aparthotel Tropic Garden
address: Pare Vicent Costa, 10, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool and a heated indoor pool, Aparthotel Tropic Garden is set next to the beach in Santa Eulària. It features free WiFi and a buffet-restaurant. Each well-equipped apartment has a balcony or terrace and a flat-screen TV. There is a sofa bed in the living area. A safe is available for an extra cost. Aparthotel Tropic Garden offers a lounge, lounge-bar and an poolside bar. Live shows are available in the hotel twice a week. Ibiza Town is 15 km away from the aparthotel. Private parking is available for an extra cost.

name: Tui Magic Life Cala Pada
address: Carrer de Cèsar Puget Riquer, 25, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: ME Ibiza
address: Urbanización S'Argamassa, 153, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Situated right in front of the beach and offering multiple swimming pools, a spa with contemporary beauty treatments, and beautiful ocean views, ME Ibiza hotel is located in S'Argamassa. Free Wi-Fi is available. This stylish and elegant hotel offers a variety of room types, including ground floor suites with direct pool access, sun loungers, private gardens and other exclusive benefits. Some suites have wonderful views of the sea. A free bottle of water is provided in all rooms. All rooms provide Smart TV with Chromecast. The Rooftop offers dazzling views, an infinity-style pool and Balinese beds, available only for adults. The ground floor presents an upbeat environment with daily DJs, Balinese beds and a poolside menu. Thai Room Spa Wellness offers Thai treatments. RADIO Rooftop bar offers Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails, with sea views while at Bianco Mare Restaurant guests can enjoy authentic Italian cuisine from organic ingredients and Origens Restaurant combines characterful Ibizan bohemian style with imaginative interpretations of classic Mediterranean dishes. Fresh ingredients and local specialities for lunch and dinner. The property offers a fitness area and free private parking. Complimentary yoga sessions are offered daily, on request and subject to availability. There is a Kids' Club. Nikki Beach Ibiza is located beside the hotel. Es Cana tourist resort is just 1.5 km away, and Ibiza town is 12 km from the property. Ibiza Airport is a 35-minute drive from the hotel. You can also hire a private boat to the beautiful neighbouring island of Formentera, on request and subject to availability. The hotel offers free valet parking.

name: Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa
address: Calle Narcisos, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa is situated on the seafront next to the Santa Eulalia River. The hotel provides free access to the fitness centre and offers many treatments in the Prestige Spa at an extra charge. Ibiza Airport is 21 km away. All spacious rooms have a balcony and flat-screen TV. The bathroom is complete with a separate bath and hydromassage shower. Guests are also provided with a bathrobe and slippers. Indoor and outdoor pool, a herbal steam room and an ice fountain are some of the spa facilities available at an extra charge. Foot baths and a variety of massages are also on offer. There are 4 restaurants offering a choice of Mediterranean, International and Asian cuisine. Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa also has several bars serving snacks, cocktails and ice cream. At the Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa reservations can be made for activities, such as yacht hire. There are golf courses within 6 km of the hotel.

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Ibiza Santa Eulalia
address: Calle Pou Roig, nº 1, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Located on Es Caná beachfront, Leonardo Royal Hotel Ibiza Santa Eulalia features a shared terrace, swimming pools, a solarium and rooms with balconies. The air-conditioned rooms come with a wardrobe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Daytime and evening entertainment for both adults and children are offered on site. Surrounded by pine groves and the sea, the area is popular for water sports. Ibiza Town is 21 km away and a 30-minute drive will take you to Ibiza Airport.

name: Grupotel Imperio Playa
address: Cala San Vicente, 07811 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Facing the beachfront, Grupotel Imperio Playa offers 4-star accommodation in Sant Joan de Labritja and has an outdoor swimming pool, terrace and restaurant. Offering a bar, the property is located within 70 metres of Cala San Vincente Beach. The accommodation offers a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Guests at Grupotel Imperio Playa can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area. Cala de S'Aigua Dolca Beach is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Marina Botafoch is 28 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 33 km from Grupotel Imperio Playa.

name: Aparthotel Puerto Cala Vadella
address: Cala Vadella, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Suite Hotel S'Argamassa Palace
address: Avinguda De S'Argamassa, 82, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Built around an inviting outdoor swimming pool, this suite hotel offers spectacular views over the beach and the Mediterranean Sea beyond – great for a peaceful break on picturesque Ibiza. It offers free Wi-Fi. The S’Argamassa Palace is surrounded by tranquil pine forests on the island’s east coast. It looks out over the golden sands of Cala Pada beach. Take a swim in the beach's clear waters or in the property’s central swimming pool, designed for both adults and children. The hotel features a gym and a hot tub. Beauty treatments are available. Finish off the day by choosing from the varied cuisine served at the hotel restaurant. This charming venue serves dishes ranging from innovative creations to traditional Spanish dishes, all out on the comfortable terrace. The S’Argamassa Palace is just 3 minutes from the Palacio de Congresos de Santa Eulalia.

name: Hotel Puchet
address: Avenue Doctor Fleming, 51, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Puchet is in a quiet area of Sant Antoni de Portmany, 600 metres from Es Pouet Beach. It offers free WiFi and a large outdoor swimming pool open from May to October. All rooms at the Hotel Puchet have a private balcony and satellite TV. The Puchet's air-conditioned café-restaurant serves international food. Buffet meal is available. Other facilities at Hotel Puchet include a poolside terrace. There is also an onsite supermarket and TV room.

name: Om Hotels
address: Disseminat sa Caleta, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Set in Sant Francesc de s'Estany, 70 metres from Es Codolar Beach, OM Hotels offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. The property is situated 1.2 km from Sa Caleta Beach, 1.5 km from Es Bol Nou Beach and 11 km from Ibiza Port. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, a concierge service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, the rooms have a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, all guest rooms at OM Hotels have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms also offer a terrace. At the accommodation all rooms include bed linen and towels. An Italian breakfast is available every morning at OM Hotels. Marina Botafoch is 12 km from the hotel, while Aguamar Water Park is 6.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 2 km from OM Hotels.

name: Marina Palace by Intercorp Hotel Group
address: Caló 104, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Located on the seafront of San Antonio Bay, Can Salia offers a range of facilities and apartments, some of them with beautiful sea views. This hotel features accommodation with balconies. Each apartment at Can Salia has a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, cooker and fridge. A cleaning service is also provided everyday. The Can Salia complex features two outdoor swimming pools and Gym. Fishing and scuba diving are also available on site. The Roof Top Swimming Pool is Only Adults (People under 16 years old are not permitted in this area. Within 500 metres of Can Salia guests can find many restaurants, bars and shops. The complex also has its own restaurant called Taste of Salia. The restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner and offers views of the Mediterranean Sea. Buffet breakfast is served in Taste of Salia restaurant by the sea. The apartments are 900 metres from Port des Torrent and Des Pinet Beaches and a 20 minute drive from San José Airport. Ibiza Town is less than 20 km from Can Salia.

address:

description: Ca Sa Vilda Marge is set in large grounds with gardens, orchards and vegetable gardens, located 5 minutes' drive from Portinatx. Ca Sa Vilda Marge features an outdoor pool with sun beds. The beautifully decorated rooms at Ca Sa Vilda Marge feature free WiFi, flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom. Most of the rooms also have a private terrace. Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks at the chillout area beside the pool. The area around the house is great for hiking. Ibiza Town is around 20 minutes’ drive from the property. You can drive to Sant Antoni and Ibiza Airport in around 30 minutes.

name: Migjorn Ibiza Suites & Spa
address: Begonias, 12-18, 07817 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Migjorn Ibiza Suites & Spa is a luxury apartment complex, located 150 metres from Playa d’en Bossa beach. It has outdoor pools, free WiFi, 24-hour reception and free public parking nearby. The complex offers modern apartments with stylish décor. Each air-conditioned apartment at Migjorn Ibiza has a kitchenette and a spacious living area with satellite TV. Set in attractive gardens, the Migjorn Ibiza Suites & Spa is designed in traditional Ibizan style. It has a business centre, a spa, a gym and a hot tub which can be used for a surcharge. There are 4 swimming pools, including 2 for children, and a pool bar. There is also a children's playground and a gastronomic restaurant. The complex is located in the heart of lively Playa d’en Bossa. Ibiza’s largest water park is nearby. There is also good access to the airport and to Ibiza Town, where you can find Pacha and Hi Nightclubs.

name: 7Pines Resort Ibiza
address: Calle Puig Delfin, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Sant Josep de sa Talaia in the Ibiza Region, 18 km from Ibiza Town, 7Pines Resort Ibiza, part of Destination by Hyatt is surrounded by pine trees and boasts views of Es Vedrà Island, has three pools in total including one outdoor pool in our public area of the spa centre. Each Suite at this resort is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a seating area for your convenience. All suites feature a terrace or balcony, and some have a private pool. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. We are provided by three restaurants and three bars: - The View, awarded by 1 Sol by 2023 Repsol Guide and included in the 2023 MICHELIN Guide (Spain & Portugal) offers a fine dining experience with an elevated and sublime tasting menu with a Nordic twist. - Cone club offer dazzling evening during the most popular sunset in Ibiza where guests can drinks exquisite cocktails accompained by nice tapas and a comfort food menu - Pershing Yacht Terrace is the place where modern Asian cuisine meets signature drinks in a sophisticated atmosphere and exceptional setting with infinite views to the Mediterranean Sea. The resort has a 1.500 m2 area with two saunas, a steam bath, showers and waterbeds. The Laguna area is a place where families enjoy in a fantastic pool adapted to kids next to a food truck and our sustainable Kids Club concept, KIO. This resort offers water sports facilities for an extra charge, and bike hire is available. San Antonio is 7 km from 7Pines Resort Ibiza, part of Destination by Hyatt, while Playa d'en Bossa is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: Parco Ibiza, by Camping San Antonio est 1961
address:
8.1

description: With garden views, Parco Ibiza, by Camping San Antonio est 1961 is situated in San Antonio and has a restaurant, full-day security, bar, garden, sun terrace and outdoor fireplace. Free WiFi is offered and private parking is available on site. Some units have a dining area and/or a balcony. Guests at the campground can enjoy a continental breakfast. Parco Ibiza, by Camping San Antonio est 1961 offers a picnic area. A bicycle rental service is available at the accommodation, while cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near Parco Ibiza, by Camping San Antonio est 1961 include San Antonio Beach, Calo des Moro Beach and Es Pouet Beach. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 21 km from the campground.

name: La Pandilla Ibiza
address: Carrer de Formentera 2-4, 07817 Sant Francesc de s'Estany
description: Set in Sant Francesc de s'Estany, 1.6 km from Es Cavallet Beach, La Pandilla Ibiza offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. 1.8 km from Las Salinas Beach and 2.8 km from Es Codolar Beach, the property provides a terrace and a bar. The accommodation features entertainment staff and free WiFi. At the hostel, every room includes a wardrobe. At La Pandilla Ibiza the rooms come with air conditioning and a private bathroom. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available every morning at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play table tennis at La Pandilla Ibiza, and the area is popular for fishing and snorkelling. Ibiza Port is 10 km from the hostel, while Marina Botafoch is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 3 km from La Pandilla Ibiza.

name: BQ Belvedere Hotel
address: Mitja Lluna, 4, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set just 850 metres from Cala Mayor, BQ Belvedere Hotel offers a free shuttle service to Palmanova Beach and free parking. It features a large lagoon pool and 2 hot tubs. All of the rooms at BQ Belvedere Hotel come with a private balcony. They all have air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. A regular entertainment programme is provided for children, including activities in the kids’ pool and live shows. A mini club is also available. All-inclusive accommodation is offered at a good price at the hotel. The Belvedere has a large garden area and sun terrace with snack-bar service, as well as a buffet restaurant. There is also a private bicycle parking. BQ Belvedere Hotel is 4 km from central Palma de Mallorca and less than 15 km from Son Sant Joan Airport. The shops of Cala Mayor are only 500 metres away.

name: Bg Hotel Pamplona
address: C/ Neopatria, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, Hotel Pamplona offers modern 4-star accommodation, as well as a private beach, a sauna and an outdoor pool. It provides a spa, as well as free Wi-Fi, body treatments and a kids pool. Hotel Pamplona Palma treats guests to a range of leisure facilities, including billiards, bicycle rental and Swimming Pool. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. Hotel Pamplona has 165 well-appointed rooms, each with an en suite bathroom. The traditional bar is an ideal place to relax with a beverage after a meal at the restaurant, which offers international cuisine for dinner. Breakfast is available 7 days a week and room service can be requested. Guests are also able to try one of the many bars and restaurants in the vicinity. Hotel Pamplona Palma is surrounded by the area's popular tourist attractions, including Palma Aquarium, which is a short walk away. Visit Mallorca StadiumVisit Mallorca Stadium is within an easy drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Grupotel Playa de Palma Suites & Spa
address: C/ Ramal Ca Na Gabriela, 4, S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Situated just 5 minutes’ walk from the beach of Bahía de Palma, this attractive hotel features a large outdoor pool and luxurious spa. The suites feature a seating area and small kitchenette. The spa at Grupotel Playa de Palma Suites & Spa includes a hydromassage indoor pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Massage and aromatherapy treatments are available. A buffet breakfast is served at Playa de Palma. In the evenings guests can enjoy international and Majorcan cuisine. There is also a poolside snack bar. The city of Palma is 15 km away. Puntiró and Son Antem Golf Courses are both within a 20-minute drive.

name: Bq Apolo Hotel
address: Carrer Miquel Massuti, 28, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: BQ Apolo Hotel is 150 metres from Ca’n Pastilla Beach in Mallorca, just 2 km from Palma Airport. It offers indoor and outdoor pools and air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony. The rooms at the BQ Apolo Hotel feature tiled floors and simple décor. Each one is equipped with satellite TV and a private bathroom. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves international food. There is also a terrace snack bar where you can get a drink or light meal throughout the day. BQ Apolo Hotel provides a pool for your leisure. You can also hire a car or bicycle from the 24-hour reception. Palma city centre is 15 minutes’ drive away. Regular bus services to the airport leave from a stop 300 metres from the hotel. Seasonal hotel: open from February to November.

name: Sheraton Mallorca Arabella Golf Hotel
address: Carrer de la Vinagrella, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The first golf resort on the island, Sheraton Mallorca Arabella Golf Hotel, continues to be a favored destination for sports enthusiasts and families. Blending Palma’s easy living with sporting heritage and generational appeal, the 93 rooms and suites are designed to suit modern lives. A first-choice location for golfers, Golf Son Vida’s 18th hole is placed within putting distance from the hotel. Bordered by two additional 18-hole pro-standard options, Golf Son Muntaner and Golf Son Quint including a pitch and putt, Sheraton Mallorca is unhindered by boundaries, with fairways and hotel grounds seamlessly merging to create an evergreen environment. Championing a family-friendly dynamic, the hotel’s extensive choice of activities, ranges from playing tennis and volleyball to catering for those willing to explore the island by bike. The brand new Arabella Kids & Tweens Club awaits to welcome our young guests, with fun games and exciting activities. Stay fit while travelling at our new Sheraton Fitness.Marriott

name: Hotel Can Alomar - Adults Only
address: Calle Sant Feliu, 1, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring a plunge pool, Hotel Can Alomar is set in the tree-lined Paseo del Borne Boulevard in the centre of Palma. There is free WiFi throughout. The spacious rooms feature satellite TV, king-size beds, a seating area and safe. The bathrooms feature a bath or a shower, hairdryer with diffuser, hairstraightener, free toiletries, and complimentary bathrobe and slippers. Room service is available. The hotel has a relaxation area located in the sun terrace, featuring a plunge pool with hot tub. It offers massages and private yoga and pilates classes at an extra charge. Treatments are also available in the Viewing Tower, with spectacular views over the cathedral and the bay. The property's trendy restaurant, De Tokio a Lima, offers a fusion of Japanese, Peruvian and Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a bar with a terrace. Set 500 metres from the seafront promenade and 1 km from the beach, Hotel Can Alomar is located a 5-minute walk from Mallorca Cathedral and Almudaina Palace. There are several shops and restaurants in the boulevard where the hotel is located.

name: Planet One Hotel
address: Trasimeno, 26, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Planet One Hotel has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in El Arenal. The property is around 15 km from Palma Yacht Club, 15 km from Palma Port and 22 km from Son Vida Golf. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, an ATM and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, the rooms at Planet One Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast is available each morning at the property. At Planet One Hotel you will find a restaurant serving Indian, Italian and Pizza cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 3-star hotel. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Playa de Palma Beach, Calo de Sant Antoni Beach and Sa Cova Baixa Beach. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 7 km from Planet One Hotel.

name: Aya Seahotel
address: Carretera Arenal, 60, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Dinner service is a la carte. Drinks are not included in the price. Set on the beachfront of Playa de Palma, this family-friendly hotel is surrounded by palms, tended gardens and an outdoor swimming pool. Free Wi-Fi is available. All air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Aya feature a private balcony, satellite TV and private bathroom. Safe and minibar are available. The hotel has a café bar with a terrace overlooking the sea. The pool area has a snack bar and sun loungers are also available. There is a 24-hour front desk where staff can provide tourist information. Compulsory bicycle parking is provided for free as well as a repair shop with cleaning area. Palma de Mallorca is 15 minutes’ drive from Hotel Aya while Mallorca International Airport is 5 km away.

name: Convent de la Missio - Adults Only
address: Carrer De La Missio, 7a, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Housed in the old monastery Convent de la Missió dating from the 17th century, this modern and chic hotel boasts an excellent location in the centre of historic Palma. Visit the beautiful, historical old town of Palma on foot from this hotel. You can stroll through the narrow streets surrounding the hotel and relax in the gardened patios. At the end of a busy days sightseeing in Palma, you can unwind in the sauna or by sitting in the cool of the interior patio. The hotel is located in the centre of Palma, allowing you to easily get to numerous bars, restaurants and the lively nightlife of the Majorcan capital.

name: Ars Magna Bleisure Hotel
address: Carrer Blanquerna 12, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, 1.9 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni, Ars Magna Bleisure Hotel provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All units include a wardrobe. A vegetarian, vegan or gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near Ars Magna Bleisure Hotel include Palma Intermodal Station, Passeig del Born Avenue and Plaza Mayor. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Bg Caballero
address: Carrer de Neopatria, 3, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated just a short walk from the long, expansive, sandy beach, the Hotel Caballero is well equipped for a fun-filled family holiday in the sunshine and on the beach. This modern hotel boasts an on-site restaurant. Caballero is the ideal place to start your day with a buffet-style breakfast. Then, head down to the nearby beach later on in the morning, lie back on the fine sands and soak up the sun. Stay on site during the day and relax by the swimming pool, take a dip to do some exercise and then grab a drink from the poolside bar. Hotel Caballero welcomes athletes. It offers special menus as well as treatments and massages. There is a bicycle garage. Dine on site in Cabelleros restaurant, where you can sample buffet-style, Mediterranean cuisine with all the family. Free WiFi is available at the lobby and Internet connection via modem is available at an extra cost. A safe can be hired.

name: Gpro Valparaiso Palace & Spa
address: c/ Francisco Vidal Sureda, 23, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This luxury hotel is set in the exclusive Bonanova district, a secluded location in Palma de Mallorca. It boasts Majorca’s largest spa, beautiful gardens and stunning views. All modern rooms at Valparaiso Palace & Spa have a private balcony with spectacular city, bay or mountain views. They are spacious and air-conditioned, and include satellite TV, a minibar and bathrobes. The Valparaiso Spa includes a huge heated pool, sauna and hot tub. There is also a steam bath, gym, ice cave and vitamin bar. All spa facilities carry an extra cost. Babies from 0 to 1 can't enter the spa. Surrounded by gardens, Valparaiso Palace & Spa is high above Palma Bay and the city. Facilities include tennis and padel courts and two large swimming pools, as well as a poolside bar open all day in summer. The Valparaiso’s gourmet Paraiso Restaurant serves a varied buffet breakfast. Specializing in show cooking, its chefs prepare Mediterranean market cuisine in front of guests. With a poolside terrace the Bistro Bar serves lunches, dinners, lighter snacks and drinks. The hotel is located 12 km from the Palma de Mallorca Airport.

name: Mll Blue Bay
address: C/ Camino Vecinal de Genova-Sant Agusti, No. 30, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in a quiet area of Palma de Mallorca, on top of a hill, Blue Bay Hotel is 400 metres from Cala Mayor Beach and shopping area. Set in extensive gardens it offers outdoor pools. All air-conditioned rooms at Blue Bay have a satellite TV and private balcony. There is a private bathroom with a shower. Free internet via modem is available. There is a buffet restaurant and a lounge bar. In summer there is a poolside bar. Packed lunches can be requested. Entertainment is provided, and there is a children’s play area and a table tennis table. There is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. You can hire a car, and free parking is available nearby, or private on-site parking for an extra charge.

name: Sol Barbados
address: Av. Notario Alemany 7, Calvia Beach, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Magaluf, Sol Barbados offers concierge services, rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and an outdoor pool. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a kids' club. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At Sol Barbados all rooms include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a vegetarian breakfast. Sol Barbados offers a children's playground, children swimming pools, Katmandu Adventures mini club, and a water park called Waterland. You can play table tennis at the hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Other services include fitness activities for adults, a bike repair shop, a bike cleaning station, and bike storage. Golf courses can be found nearby. Popular points of interest near Sol Barbados include Aqua land, Nikki Beach Mallorca and The Stage. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 28 km from the accommodation.

name: Hostal Alce
address: Parcellas, 14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located just 150 metres from Las Maravillas Beach in Mallorca’s lively Playa de Palma resort, Hostal Alce features an outdoor swimming pool and a garden with palm trees. All rooms are air conditioned and have an en suite bathroom. There is also a balcony. Hostal Alce offers breakfast in the garden. The hotel’s bar and restaurant with international cuisine, opened 24 hours a day. The hotel is 100 metres from the Riu Palace nightclub. The bars and discos of Beer Street and Ham Street are just a 10-minute walk away.

name: Agroturismo Finca Son Amora
address: Avenida Del Cid km 1'2, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in Palma de Mallorca, 11 km from Palma Yacht Club, Agroturismo Finca Son Amora features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. Each room comes with a patio with pool views and free WiFi. At the inn the rooms come with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a mountain view. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Agroturismo Finca Son Amora. Palma Port is 12 km from the accommodation, while Son Vida Golf is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from Agroturismo Finca Son Amora.

name: Hotel Manaus
address: Carrer De Josep Maria Quadrado, 7, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: A few minutes walk to Majorcas Palma Beach and in a quiet area surrounded by woods, this hotel has a charming bar and restaurant to relax in as well as an outdoor pool. Enjoy a quiet read in the inviting lounge. Grab a snack from the cafe and enjoy wholesome meals in the Manaus's restaurant. During the summer months, sit back and watch the show-cooking. Spend afternoons soaking up the sunshine by the Manaus's pool and hot tub. Make the pleasant, 600-m stroll down to Palma Beach where you can have a refreshing dip in the Mediterranean and lie back on the sandy shores.

name: SENTIDO Diamant Hotel
address: Los Romeros, 10, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Set next to Majorca’s picturesque Cala Agulla beach and surrounded by lush gardens, this family hotel provides facilities for a relaxing yet active holiday under the sun. Hotel Diamant has outdoor pools with sundecks, as well as an indoor pool. There is a gym and a sauna. Massage services are available for an extra charge. The air-conditioned rooms at the Diamant feature Mallorcan-style décor. Each one comes with a TV, a private bathroom and a balcony. Free Wi-Fi access is provided in the rooms. The hotel’s snack bar serves buffet meals of national and international dishes. There is also a bar where you can enjoy a drink in the sun. The hotel is in a large complex, sharing its facilities with the Aparthotel Diamant.

name: Hotel Condesa
address: C/ Roselles, 4, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Hotel Condesa is a 4-star hotel situated right on the beach of Playa de Alcúdia. Large spaces and facilities, comfortable rooms and qualified staff will make your stay a perfect experience! The hotel is located in Alcúdia, the north of Mallorca, ideal place for active vacations thanks to the wide range of sports and leisure activities on offer. Some of the best golf courses are only 8 km from the hotel. Hotel Condesa has 466 rooms with modern, sophisticated design that fits perfectly for couples and families. All rooms are equipped with a complete bathroom, balcony, air conditioning and heating, TV, desk, minibar and safe. You can enjoy the most delicious cuisine with the wide range of dishes available in our various bars and restaurants. Don't miss to visit our Sky Bar (New opening 2021) to enjoy the magnificent views of the Mediterranean, the comfort and chill-out atmosphere. There are three outdoor swimming pools as well as a large solarium with panoramic views to the entire Playa of Alcudia and direct access to the beach. Would you like to have some relax? Our Finnish sauna is ideal for you! The hotel is also equipped with a gym for those who like to keep fit during their holidays.FarePortal

name: Dreams Calvia Mallorca
address: Avenida Notario Alemany, 26-34, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca, Balears, Spain, 07181 Magaluf, Mallorca
description: Situated in Magaluf, 100 metres from Magaluf Beach, Dreams Calvia Mallorca offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Dreams Calvia Mallorca rooms have bed linen and towels. Continental and vegetarian breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. At Dreams Calvia Mallorca you will find a restaurant serving American, Italian and Japanese cuisine. Vegetarian and gluten-free options can also be requested. The hotel offers a children's playground. Popular points of interest near Dreams Calvia Mallorca include Cala Vinyes Beach, Son Maties Beach and Western Water Park. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa
address: Carrer Gavines, 19, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa, 200 metres from Mallorca’s Paguera Beach, offers indoor and outdoor pools and a spa. Santa Ponsa Golf Club is 5 km away. Surrounded by pine forest and mountains, the Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa is a 5-minute walk from Paguera’s lively main boulevard, with its bars, restaurants, shops and discos. The bright, air-conditioned rooms have a private balcony, as well as a TV and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa includes a sauna and hot tub, and a massage service is available. There is a TV lounge and a games room with table tennis and billiards. Entertainment is provided for children and adults. Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa has a buffet restaurant, as well as a bar and snack bar. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk, and offers bicycle rental and currency exchange.

name: Hotel & Spa Ferrer Janeiro
address: Avinguda Diagonal, 4, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Ferrer Janeiro Hotel & Spa is just metres from the beach in Can Picafort and has its own outdoor swimming pool. There is free WiFi available throughout. The rooms at Hotel Janeiro offer bright décor and a private balcony with great views. All come with air conditioning, satellite TV and heating. Hotel Ferrer Janeiro’s spa centre features a sauna, fitness centre and Turkish baths. Massages are also available on site. A range of Mediterranean and international dishes are served at the hotel’s buffet restaurant with show cooking. Children can enjoy the play area and games room. Hotel Janeiro also offers a regular entertainment programme.

name: Portblue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Alcudia - Pto Pollensa Km 2, 07400 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: PortBlue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa, 5 km from Alcudia, offers extensive sports facilities, including 3 swimming pools, a tennis court and watersports centre. Please note that the spa is available at an extra cost. Each air-conditioned room has a balcony overlooking the gardens or sea. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The property's spacious, airy rooms are decorated in soft colours. They all include a fridge, a laptop safe and a seating area with sofa. The hotel’s wellness centre has a spa bath (with an extra cost), Turkish bath (with an extra cost) and a gym (free of charge). Beauty treatments (with an extra cost) and massages (with an extra cost) are also available. PortBlue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa has à la carte and buffet restaurants, as well as 4 bars, including a bar with nightly music. There is also a minimarket and gift shop. PortBlue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa is located on the seafront in Majorca’s Pollensa Bay next to Can Cap de Bou Beach. Puerto Pollensa is within 5 km, while the S'Albufera Nature Reserve is 8 km away.

name: Hotel Alondra
address: Carrer de's Farallo, 5, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: HOTEL ALONDRA has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Cala Ratjada. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 200 metres from Son Moll Beach. At the hotel, rooms come with a balcony. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Speaking German, English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception. Popular points of interest near HOTEL ALONDRA include La Ferradura Beach, Cala Gat Beach and Cala Agulla Beach. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 79 km from the accommodation.

name: Eques Petit Resort
address: Avinguda de Calonge 9, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Set in Cala d´Or and with Cala D'or Beach reachable within 300 metres, Eques Petit Resort offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property features a seasonal outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and garden. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Eques Petit Resort every room includes bed linen and towels. Guests can enjoy the spa and wellness centre, organise trips at the tour desk, or rent a car to explore the surroundings. Cala Gran Beach is 700 metres from the accommodation, while Calo des Pou Beach is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 60 km from Eques Petit Resort, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Ferrer Concord
address: Carrer Isaac Peral, 89, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Looking over Alcúdia Bay, this holiday hotel is set beside sand dunes and pine forests and in front of sands and Mediterranean waters. The Ferrer Concord boasts direct access to the beaches of Son Bauló. You can also enjoy the sunshine by lying back on a beachfront sun lounger. Spend your daytime getting involved in the sporting activities available on site, including aqua gym, beach and walking trips. As a guest of the Ferrer Concord you enjoy use of the excellent facilities at the nearby Hotel Ferrer Janeiro. These include a fantastic spa and wellness centre as well as activities for younger guests.

name: Aluasun Torrenova
address: Avenida Torrenova, 51, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma Nova, Hotel Aluasun Torrenova has a large outdoor swimming pool, a children’s splash pool. It is just 100 metres from Palma Nova Beach and has great sea views. The Aluasun Torrenova’s air-conditioned rooms include satellite TV, private balcony and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms also have views over the sea. The buffet restaurant at the Aluasun Torrenova offers international dishes. There is also a snack bar by the pool. The Aluasun Torrenova has excellent facilities for children, with a games room and an outdoor play area. The indoor Mini Club caters for children from 4 to 12, and a nursery is also available. There is an entertainment programme throughout the day and night, as well as professional shows. Car and bicycle rental are available on site.

name: Hm Mar Blau
address: Gesamins 1-3, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Mar Blau features a bar, a garden and a sun terrace with swimming pool and continental breakfast in Sa Coma. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a kids' club, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the hotel, each room includes a wardrobe. At Mar Blau every room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Cala Millor is 3.2 km from the accommodation, while Cala Ratjada is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 67 km from Mar Blau.

name: Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa
address: Carrer Torrenova 25-27, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Situated in Palmanova, 500 metres from Magaluf Beach, Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation offers nightclub and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room is fitted with a kettle, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature sea views. At Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a gluten-free breakfast. Son Maties Beach is 600 metres from Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa, while Palma Nova Beach is 1.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Ecocirer Healthy Stay
address: Carrer de Reial 15, 07100 Soller, Mallorca
description: Ecocirer Healthy Stay features air-conditioned accommodation in Sóller. Both free WiFi and private parking are accessible at the hotel. At Ecocirer Healthy Stay, every room is equipped with a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower, while certain units at the accommodation also boast a seating area. A fresh home made vegan/vegetarian breakfast is served each morning at the property. Palma de Mallorca is 22 km from Ecocirer Healthy Stay, while Alcudia is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 24 km from the property.

name: Grupotel Alcudia Pins
address: Carre Canyes, 07408 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Facing the beachfront, Grupotel Alcudia Pins offers 3-star accommodation in Playa de Muro and features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and garden. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation offers an ATM, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. At Grupotel Alcudia Pins every room includes bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or gluten-free options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis at Grupotel Alcudia Pins, and bike hire and car hire are available. Es Comu Beach is 500 metres from the hotel, while Playa de Muro Beach is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 63 km from Grupotel Alcudia Pins.

name: Hotel Vibra Beverly Playa
address: Carrer D'Isaac Albeniz, 3, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Situated on the beachfront of one of the best beaches of Paguera Village, this hotel is a short distance from the centre of this tourist destination par excellence of Mallorca. The hotel has 443 bedrooms, all exterior facing and with sea views. It boasts excellent facilities including a swimming pool complete with its own bar, an indoor pool, a gym, billiard tables and miniclub among others. You can also enjoy the buffet restaurant service. This is a perfect location that will make your stay a very pleasant one. Please note that reservations are paid on arrival, except for non-refundable rates which are paid at the time of booking. In the event of early departure, guests should notify the property at least 72 hours in advance, otherwise the hotel will charge an additional 2 nights' fee. Restaurant buffet with breakfast service from 7:30 to 10:30, lunch with show cooking from 13:00-15:00, and dinner with showcooking from 18:30-21:30 Groups: When booking more than 3 rooms, special conditions and supplements may apply.

name: Grupotel Gran Vista & Spa
address: Ctra. Artà-Alcúdia, 68, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Located just a short walk to the Can Picafort beach, surrounded by gardens lays this complex made up of the hotel and apartments with free spa access and free WiFi. The complex offers guests all they need for a fun filled, enjoyable family holiday, including; 2 large swimming pools with children’s pool, mini-club and children’s playground, entertainment programmes, a free Spa & Wellness centre, Conference room for up to 40 people and a sports centre. Alcudia is 12 km away and Palma de Mallorca is 50 km from Grupotel Gran Vista & Spa. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 50 minutes' drive away.

name: Robinson Cala Serena
address: 7660 Cala Serena/Cala D`Or Felanitx, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Featuring outdoor pools overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, this hotel lies between 2 small bays on the East coast of Mallorca. It includes a spa and tennis courts. Surrounded by palm trees, the ROBINSON Cala Serena has air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony or terrace. In-room facilities include refrigerators, bathrobes and satellite TV. Varied buffets and late breakfasts are served in the Robinson Club’s main restaurant. There are also 2 elegant, à-la-carte restaurants serving Spanish specialities. The hotel organises a range of water sports and has direct beach access. Guests can book spa treatments or enjoy a round of golf on site. In the evenings, the club theatre provides entertaining shows. The sandy beach of Cala Serena is located in the Cala d'Or resort, just 7 km from the Cala Mondrago Nature Park. Robinson Club offers rental bicycles, rental cars and free parking.

name: The St. Regis Mardavall Mallorca Resort
address: Carretera Palma-Andratx 19, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: A refined tastemaker located on the southwest coast of Mallorca, The St. Regis Mardavall Mallorca is a luxurious family resort offering an exceptional retreat. Arranged across four terracotta-hued buildings, the 125 guestrooms and suites all have large private terraces with an alluring Mediterranean vista. An arbiter of the island’s most distinctive flavors, connoisseurs from near and far converge to dine at our exceptional Michelin-starred Es Fum Restaurant, while the St. Regis Bar with its modern design sets new heights as a lobby art bar on the island. Our new contemporary designed Terra Restaurant brings a fresh air to the hotels classic look with its “Farm to Table” concept, celebrating the island’s rich culinary heritage and local produce. Mar Sea Club will make for a luxurious shore side atmosphere, a go-to destination for those seeking the ultimate in relaxation and indulgence with captivating sea views or by our newly renovated cascade swimming pool.Marriott

name: Viva Sunrise
address: Avenida Mexico 7, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: The Aparthotel VIVA Sunrise is located in Puerto Alcudia, just 400 metres from the beach. It offers free Wi-Fi, separate adult and children’s pools, surrounded by sun terraces with loungers and parasols. Apartments and studios feature air conditioning and a kitchenette equipped with a fridge. They also include a balcony and private bathroom. VIVA Sunrise has a poolside bar, La Palapa, serving snacks and light meals, including pizza. Guests can enjoy buffet meals at Caprice restaurant and an à la carte menu at El Patio. Bicycle and car hire can be arranged at Sunrise’s tour desk. This is a seasonal hotel, open from April to October.

name: Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous
address: Arquitecto Francisco Casas, 18, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous is located within Mallorca’s Bendinat Golf Course, 5 km from Palma. It offers a free spa, indoor and outdoor swimming pools and spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony and free WiFi. Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous has colonial-style décor, with African influences. It is surrounded by extensive gardens and terraces, ideal for relaxing. The spa features 2 saunas, a Turkish bath, sunbeds and experience showers. Treatments are available for an extra charge. Overlooking the golf course or swimming pool, each room has flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a seating area. A bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer are included in the bathroom. Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous Resort’s restaurants serve gourmet international and Mediterranean-style cuisine. There is also a poolside bar. Free private parking is offered at the Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous. Palma and the Porti Pi Shopping Centre can be reached in 10 minutes by car or bus.

name: Grupotel Montecarlo
address: Jovellanes, 2, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Situated 300 metres from the beach in the centre of Ca'n Picafort, Grupotel Montecarlo offers spacious rooms alongside elegant lounges, beautiful gardens and terraces. The Montecarlo Hotel has double and single rooms. Other features include luggage storage, a courtesy room with shower for day of departure and confirmation of flights, swimming pool towels, medical service.

name: Zafiro Tropic
address: C/. Anselm Turmeda, 1, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Zafiro Tropic is located 200 metres from the beach in Port d’Alcúdia in northern Mallorca. It has a large garden, 3 swimming pools and a spa with Turkish baths. All apartments and studios at Zafiro Tropic are air-conditioned and have a private balcony. They also have satellite TV. Hotel Zafiro Tropic has one pool with a pirate ship and slides and one chillout pool with Balinese beds. In the garden there are loungers and parasols, and the hotel offers a varied entertainment programme for adults and children. Zafiro Tropic’s Caprice restaurant serves Mediterranean and international food. The hotel also has a poolside snack bar, La Palapa. El Patio bar and restaurant offers nightly shows, and you can enjoy cocktails in Cafe-Bar Babalú. The S’Albufera Nature Reserve is just 5 km away from Zafiro Tropic- The town of Alcúdia, located 2 km away, has a 14th-century wall.

name: Viva Eden Lago
address: Carrer De Les Savines, Urb. Lago Esperanza, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: The Eden Lago’s setting just 300 metres from the beach on Majorca’s Alcudia Bay makes it an ideal spot for a relaxing break in the sunshine. The aparthotel’s facilities also allow you to make the most of the island’s amazing climate, with an outdoor swimming pool and terraces surrounded by lush gardens. You can also enjoy the tranquillity offered by the nearby S’Albufera Nature Park and the historic seaside city of Alcudia.

name: Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa
address: Belgica, 91, Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Located on Mallorca’s north-west coast, this modern hotel overlooks the Port de Sóller Bay. It offers an impressive infinity pool, a fitness centre and a spa, all with fantastic views. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa feature a private balcony, free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV. Each one has a coffee maker and a minibar. Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa has 3 restaurants which serve a wide range of dishes and offer fantastic sea views. Cap Roig offers traditional Mediterranean food and Es Fanals serves a creative selection of Spanish tapas and Sunset Sushi Lounge is popular for its selection of freshly prepared sushi, Asian-style tapas and locally inspired cocktails.There are also 2 pool-side bars. Talise Spa at Jumeirah Port Soller features a hammam suite, a heated hydropool and a thermal area. The town of Valldemossa is a 25-minute drive from the hotel. Central Palma and Palma Airport are each 35 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hsm Solivera
address: Eucaliptus, 16, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Situated 300 metres from Palmira Beach in Paguera, HSM S’Olivera offers a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace with gardens. In winter, there is a free indoor pool, hot tub and sauna. Each air-conditioned room at HSM S’Olivera has a balcony and satellite TV. Decorated in light colours, rooms have tiled floors and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s spacious buffet restaurant offers a wide selection of cold and hot dishes, including homemade desserts. There is a poolside bar service in summer. HSM Hotel S’Olivera is just 250 metres from Paguera’s seafront promenade, which is full of shops, bars and restaurants. You can walk along the seafront to Santa Ponsa, Palmanova or Magaluf. Palma de Mallorca is 22 km away, and buses to the city stop just 250 metres away.

name: HSM Atlantic Park Hotel
address: C/Calderon De La Barca 2, Magaluf, Mallorca
description: The hotel stands out mostly for its situation, very close to the beach and leisure centre of Magalluf, but at the same time in a quiet place, without the noise and hustle of the resort´s famous nightlife. It is set at 25 km away from the airport and 15 km from the centre of Palma. The hotel offers spacious rooms that present elegant and modern decoration and colours. Each room comes with air-conditioning, cable TV and a bathroom with bath amenities. The hotel also offers high standard facilities and service with spacious and modern restaurant offers buffet style. The hotel is specialised and certified in golf: it offers the general information about golf courses in Majorca, as well as discounts in “green fees” in the most important golf courses, etc. Possibility to practice sports in the area.FarePortal

name: Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort
address: Cala Antena, Cales de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and restaurant in Calas de Mallorca. This 4-star hotel offers a kids' club, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel has an indoor pool, evening entertainment and an ATM. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort provides certain units with sea views, and every room is fitted with a balcony. All units include a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. You can play table tennis at Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Cala Antena Beach, Cala Domingos Gran Beach and Cala Domingos Petit Beach. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 63 km from Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort.

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Mallorca Palmanova Bay
address: Carrer Torrenova, 3-5, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: The apart-hotel was refurbished in 2017 and is very comfortable equipped. It is situated on the Torrenova headland next to the Leonardo Royal Mallorca, the excellent location in front of the sea makes a perfect holiday. The ideal environment for families and couples alike, where the beach and the mountains are always within sight. From the panoramic terrace you can enjoy the swimming pools, pool bar, the sea view and a lively atmosphere. A magnificent place that combines tranquillity and comfort. You can have fun with all types of watersports offered at the beach or just relax watching the sunset.

name: Iberostar Playa de Muro
address: Avenida Albufera, 07408 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Iberostar Playa de Muro has an ideal setting overlooking Muro Beach, 100 metres from Albufera Nature Reserve. This resort has a main pool, two children's pools and an indoor pool in the Spa area, a spa and rooms with balconies. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. The Playa de Muro features elegant décor throughout. Its rooms have TVs with satellite channels and a minibar. The hotel has 3 restaurants,1 snack bar with sea views and a food truck by the pool. The on-site spa features an indoor swimming pool, a hot tub, heated loungers, a rain-effect shower and 2 saunas. There is also a gym. A kid's club is available from May to October. Iberostar Playa de Muro offers unique services for cyclists and sports travelers. There is a repair shop, garage and a fully equipped gym. Bicycles are available for hire, there are special menus, sports shop and a dedicated team. S’Estany Gran Lake is just 15 minutes’ walk from the resort.

name: Sol Katmandu Park & Resort
address: Calle Galeón, 07181 Magaluf, Mallorca
description: Sol Katmandu Park & Resort is located just 5 minutes' walk from Magalluf Beach and it is within the Katmandu Theme Park. It offers 2 swimming pools, one of which is only for children, and free WiFi throughout. The property organises a varied entertainment programme for children with Boro & Friends Musical Buffet & Show. Guests have free access to Katmandu Theme Park's wide range of rides including a splash park, a soft play adventure area and a 4D cinema. Sol Katmandu Park & Resort offers rooms with a furnished terrace or balcony, offering views of the mountains or the pool and garden. There is a satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar, and telephone. A safe is available for an extra charge. The bathroom comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. The hotel’s themed buffet restaurant offers international food. There is also a lounge bar and a poolside bar. There are many golf courses nearby, and the Western Water Park is just 2 km away. Within 5 minutes you can walk to Magalluf's main shopping and leisure areas. Palma de Mallorca is 15 km away.

name: Prinsotel Alba & Spa
address: Carrer de Conillera, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Set in the resort of Cala d’Or, this recently renovated holiday complex is set just a few steps away from the crystal-clear Mediterranean waters of Cala Gran. Free WiFi is available throughout. The property has been built in a typical Balearic style, providing an authentic Majorcan experience. Relax in the sunshine on a sun lounger before diving into the large outdoor swimming pool. You can also enjoy a cool drink beside the pool from the outdoor bar. Refreshing drinks are also available in the lounge bar. The property is surrounded by Cala d’Or – one of Majorca’s most popular seaside and water sports resorts. From here, you can easily enjoy all that this beautiful island has to offer. Exploring at your own pace is made easy by the reception’s car and bike rental service.

name: Mar Hotels Playa Mar & Spa
address: Carretera Formentor s/n, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Playa Mar & Spa offers bright studios, 50 metres from the beach in Puerto Pollença, Mallorca. There is a tennis court, outdoor pool, and spa with heated indoor pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Each apartment has a balcony, twin bedroom and living room with a sofa bed and TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The complex has an air-conditioned restaurant, bar and snack bar. There are several lounges and a TV and video room. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Playa Mar & Spa has 24-hour reception and you can hire a car or bicycle. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge.

name: Hotel Na Forana
address: Arquitecto Alomar, 5, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Hotel Na Forana is set on Son Moll Beach, between Cala Rajada and Capdepera. It features a gym, hot tub, an indoor pool and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool overlooking the beach. Each bright, air-conditioned room at Hotel Na Forana has elegant décor, a TV, a safe and a minibar. Many rooms offer balconies with sea views. You can enjoy a range of Mediterranean dishes in the Na Forana’s buffet restaurant, which offers show cooking twice a day. There are also spacious lounge areas with free Wi-Fi. Free kayak tours are organised from the Hotel Na Forana reception desk. The centre of Cala Rajada is a 5-minute walk from the hotel, while Capdepera is a 20-minute walk away. There are 2 golf courses within 5 km of the Na Forana.

name: Hotel More
address: C. Tirant Lo Blanc, 8, 07409 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Featuring a sun terrace with sun loungers, garden and outdoor pool, Hotel More is a beachfront property featuring room with sea-view balconies. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Each room is air-conditioned and has a double bed or 2 single beds. It includes a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom has a bath or shower and hairdryer. The hotel also has a buffet restaurant and bar. There is also an evening entertainment, but various bars can be found within a 15-minute walk. Alcanda Golf Course is 5 km from the property and Port of Alcudia and Pollentia are both 3 km away.

name: Aparthotel Novo Mar
address: Gavines, 3, 07181 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Aparthotel Novo Mar is 100 metres from Paguera’s Torá Beach, in south-western Mallorca. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, free WiFi and air-conditioned apartments with a terrace and flat-screen TV. Each bright and modern Novo Mar apartment has tiled floors and a living room with a sofa. The private bathroom comes with amenities, and the well-equipped kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Most apartments have sea views. (upon request and subject to availability) A buffet breakfast is available at the Novo Mar complex. You can also have dinner in the restaurant on prior request, and show cooking is offered. Special diet menus can be requested and there is also a lounge with a flat-screen TV and a bar. Wi-Fi is offered throughout the complex, and is free in public areas. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. Santa Ponsa Golf Course is 3 km away and Camp de Mar Golf Course is 3.5 km away.

name: Catalonia Eixample 1864
address: Roger De Llúria 60, 08009 Barcelona
description: Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, this 19th-century building offers stylish modern interiors and free WiFi. It is just 300 metres from the designer shops and Gaudí buildings of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is housed in one of the Eixample’s oldest buildings, and its painted façade gives it the Speciality Monument status. All soundproofed en-suite rooms sleek wooden floors and furniture, air conditioning and all rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. Some rooms have a private terrace and pool. A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered every morning at the Sala Minerva; while the hotel's Les Finestres de Llúria restaurant serves traditional Catalan food with a creative twist. Room service is also available. Catalonia Eixample 1864 boasts a rooftop swimming pool, sundeck and bar; as well as a gym. The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is ideally located just a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Station. Plaza Catalunya Square is a 10-minute walk away. The hotel offers private parking on-site for an extra cost and an electric vehicle charging station.

name: NH Barcelona Stadium
address: Travessera de Les Corts, 150-152, 08028 Barcelona
description: Formerly known as NH Rallye, the NH Barcelona Stadium hotel is in a convenient location in the Les Corts area of Barcelona. Several local points of interest are easily accessible within walking distance such as the FC Barcelona stadium and museum, El Corte Inglés, and the L'illa Diagonal shopping mall. The metro station Les Corts with links to the city center is only a few minutes away. Contemporary comforts such as air-conditioning, Wi-Fi and satellite TV come as standard in each of our 106 modern guest rooms. Other rooms offer a spacious sitting area and a coffee or tea maker. A delightful breakfast buffet is freshly prepared for our guests every morning. Made-to-order hot meals and an early bird breakfast are also available upon request. The Ristorante Don Giovanni by renowned chef Andrea Tumbarello with its typical Italian flavors and top-quality seasonal products or enjoy an aperitif with some snacks at the Gastrobar right next to the restaurant. Our friendly staff is on hand to offer recommendations for excellent local restaurants for additional lunch or dinner selections. We are pleased to host events both large and small. The NH Barcelona Stadium has seven meeting rooms which hold up to a maximum of 250 guests. With advance notice, our special events services team can assist with menu planning, equipment and services.NH Hoteles

name: El Avenida Palace
address: Gran Via De Les Corts Catalanes, 605, 08003 Barcelona
description: El Avenida Palace Hotel is set on Barcelona’s Gran Via, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, La Rambla and Paseo de Gracia. Its grand interior features an impressive staircase and marble columns. Many famous guests have stayed at the Hotel Avenida Palace, including the Beatles in 1965. The elegant air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and carpeted or parquet floors. Rooms are soundproofed and have a minibar, work desk and a safe. The hotel's panoramic rooftop terrace offers views over the city, a sun deck and a swimming pool. There is also a lounge bar, a 24-hour front desk and both free WiFi and room service are available.

name: Ocean Drive Barcelona
address: Calle Aragon 300, 08009 Barcelona
description: Ocean Drive Barcelona features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Eixample district of Barcelona. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a seasonal outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a selection of international cuisine in the in-house restaurant.
