At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Ocean Drive Barcelona also offer free WiFi. All guest rooms include a wardrobe. Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Guests will have free access to Urquinaona Holmes Place Gym, 800 metres from the hotel. Ocean Drive Barcelona offers a terrace. Casa Batllo is 300 metres from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: Novotel Barcelona City
address: Avinguda Diagonal 201, 08018 Barcelona
description: Upon arrival you will be greeted by our team in a close, friendly way. Enjoy our buffet breakfast and the magic of show-cooking, plus the Mediterranean cuisine served in our restaurant with fresh and seasonal products. Visit the 19th floor and enjoy the spectacular panoramic view of Barcelona, with a cocktail or some tapas. Immerse yourself in our pool under the sun's rays.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Sofia Barcelona, In The Unbound Collection By Hyatt
address: Plaza de Pio XII, 4, 08028 Barcelona
description: Hotel Sofia Barcelona is set on Barcelona's Diagonal Avenue, a 5-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. It features free WiFi throughout, on-site restaurants and stunning city views. Guests have free access to a bright, modern 24-hour gym with a variety of equipment. Designer rooms at Sofia offer home automation technology, a 49-inch Smart TV, a safe, and air conditioning. Their private bathroom includes Natura Bissé amenities, bathrobes and slippers. The hotel offers several gastronomic spaces, including SOFIA Be So restaurant serving traditional dishes, and Impar Restaurant, which serves fresh Mediterranean dishes prepared with international culinary techniques. It also features a spacious outdoor terrace. Guests will also find a sophisticated book cafe, Philosofia, which serves confectionery and fresh pastries, to eat in or take away. Sofia Oasis Wellness & Spa houses more than 1000 m² space for well-being, including water circuits, saunas and steam baths. You can relax with one of the range of treatments available onsite and coordinated by expert therapists. Sofia Barcelona, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt is 400 metres from Maria Cristina Metro Station and the central Plaza España Square is 3 metro stops away. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is 15 minutes away on foot We accept dogs up to 18 kg in weight, with a maximum of one per room. For pets. Dogs classified as dangerous breeds are not allowed. Pets must comply with current health regulations. They must be supervised by an adult at all times and steady on a leash when going through public areas. €100 will be charged for deep cleaning of the room at the time of departure. (Service dogs are exempt from said fee) €25 per pet per day will be charged in addition to the room rate.

name: H10 Madison
address: C/ Dr. Joaquim Pou, 2-4-6, 08002 Barcelona
description: Conveniently located in the centre of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Barcelona. It provides free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and a rooftop terrace. H10 Madison has a fitness centre with a swimming pool, a rooftop terrace and a sun deck. Facilities include an all-hours reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. H10 Madison offers air conditioned rooms with a rain shower, luxury toiletries and a mini bar. Each includes its very own bathroom with bathrobes, a hair dryer and slippers. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to have a meal. Room service is also offered during limited hours. Situated a short walk from Placa de Catalunya Metro Station, the hotel offers a tour desk with information on what to see and do in Barcelona. Guests can also easily visit Placa de Catalunya, La Rambla and the Liceu.Revato

name: NH Collection Barcelona Pódium
address: Bailen 4-6, 08010 Barcelona
description: Stay in one of Barcelona’s loveliest neighborhoods at the NH Collection Barcelona Pódium. Only steps away from the Arc de Triomf, the hotel enjoys a central location and is a short 15-minute walk to the luxury stores along Passeig de Gràcia and the bustling Las Ramblas. Stroll through the Parc de la Ciutadella or go there for an invigorating run. The Arc de Triomf metro and train station is right by the hotel, providing direct links to everything in the city. The harbor and zoo are also nearby. NH Collection Barcelona Pódium has 140 stylish rooms, some of which come with balconies. Each has its own Nespresso machine, a pillow menu and premium mattress for perfect sleep. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. For relaxation throughout the day, head to the rooftop pool or to the gym and sauna. A lavish breakfast with fresh delicacies including Catalan specialties is served daily. In the afternoons and evenings, choose between a contemporary Mediterranean restaurant or head to the rooftop tapas bar. In the winter, unwind with a drink at the ground-floor bar. For your special events or even for a wedding, reserve our spectacular terrace or one of the 8 meeting rooms.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Paxton Barcelona
address: Carrer De Llull 160, 08005 Barcelona
description: Located in Barcelona, 1 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel Paxton Barcelona provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Paxton Barcelona each room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. At Hotel Paxton Barcelona you will find a restaurant serving Italian and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. The hotel offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near Hotel Paxton Barcelona include Mar Bella Beach, Nova Icaria Beach and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel SB Icaria
address: Avenida Icaria 195, 08005 Barcelona
description: Located 300 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Icaria Beach, Hotel SB Icaria offers a gym, sauna and outdoor pool with sun terrace and hot tub. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. The Hotel SB Icaria’s stylish modern rooms feature wooden floors and adjustable lighting. Each room has a minibar, safe and private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Mediterranean market cuisine. There is also a bar and a garden terrace. Hotel SB Icaria is located in the Olympic Port area, a 10-minute walk from Ciutadella Park and Barcelona Zoo. Ciutadella Metro Station is 800 metres away, and is just 2 stops from Barcelona Cathedral and the historic Gothic Quarter.

name: Kimpton Vividora Hotel
address: Carrer Del Duc 15, 08002 Barcelona
description: Welcome to the first Kimpton Hotels & Restaurants in Spain. Located in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter Kimpton Vividora Hotel is a relaxing escape and vibrant hub for locals and travelers alike. The hotel sits right next to Las Ramblas and is within walking distance of the Barceloneta beach. An ideal location with other nearby attractions that include the city’s shopping epicenter and the Gothic Cathedral. Tucked away on a pedestrian street in Barcelona’s city center, our lifestyle design hotel is conveniently 20 minutes away from El Prat airport and 10 minutes from both the cruise port and Sants train station. Enjoy sightseeing plans to Sagrada Familia and La Boqueria but also experience authentic Barcelona by walking the streets of the city. The accommodations accentuate the Mediterranean and contemporary design combined with luxurious comforts, superlative service and standout amenities. Join us at our evening social hour, discover the city with our complimentary bikes and longboards and taste local gastronomy at our Fauna restaurant, Got Coffee & Cocktails or Terraza de Vivi. Don't leave your furry friend at home because we're a pet-friendly hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: NH Collection Barcelona Constanza
address: Carrer de Deu i Mata 69-99, 08029 Barcelona
description: Created by Pritzker prize-winning architect Rafael Moneo, NH Collection Barcelona Constanza exudes calm elegance. A 15-minute drive from the city center, it is situated in the Les Corts financial district of Barcelona. This is the perfect choice for business travelers, with the Axa Auditorium right next door. Landmarks, such as the FC Barcelona Camp Nou is also close by. NH Collection Barcelona Constanza has 308 rooms, including 7 Junior Suites and 1 Suite. Each has flat-screen TVs, a Nespresso machine and free Wi-Fi. Enjoy contemporary design with polished wood, glass and large windows, along with modern comforts, such as a rain-effect shower and a pillow menu. Breakfast will be the perfect start to your day with a large spread of options, including eggs prepared-to-order and gluten-free dishes. Lunch and dinner can be enjoyed at GoXO Restaurant and accompanied by a cocktail. Enjoy these on a beautiful terrace. For business travelers, NH Collection Barcelona Constanza is the perfect choice, with 11 rooms holding up to 800 guests. To unwind, head to the outdoor 7th floor pool or visit the fitness center and the spa.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero
address: Plaça de Llevant, 08019 Barcelona
description: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona is opposite Barcelona’s International Convention Centre and Barcelona's Forum Auditorium. It has a spa, a gym, a seasonal panoramic pool and a solarium on the hotel rooftop. There is free access to the hotel gym. The spa is only for guests over 14, and includes a Turkish bath and Finnish sauna. Beauty and massage treatments are available at a surcharge. All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona have flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi and a laptop safe. The soundproofed rooms have facilities to connect iPods. All rooms have ironing facilities, tea and coffee making facilities, and a kettle. There is a touch-screen control for lights and temperature. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer, and bathrobes and slippers can be provided upon request.

name: Sallés Hotel Pere IV
address: C/Pallars,128, 08018 Barcelona
description: Pere IV is situated in the Poble Nou District, 10 minutes’ walk from the lively Port Olimpic area and Barcelona's beaches. This hotel features a free spa, free Wi-Fi and 24-hour reception. Each of the spacious rooms comes with a minibar, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The à la carte Garum Restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel serves a daily, buffet breakfast. Guests enjoy free access to the Pere IV's spa, which includes a Finnish sauna, a hammam, indoor pool and sensation showers. The Pere IV is a short walk from the beach and the new marina. Nearby Bogatell Metro Station offers easy access to the beach and the city centre, which can both be reached within 15 minutes.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona
address: Passeig De Gracia, 38-40, 08007 Barcelona
description: Set on Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gràcia, the luxurious Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona is within 5 minutes’ walk of Gaudi’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Plaça Catalunya is just a 10-minute walk away. The hotel features a spa, rooftop pool, indoor pool, fitness centre, wonderful city views, and 24-hour room service. The spacious rooms feature bright, minimalist design. They include a home theatre, a seating area, large flat-screen TV, CD and DVD player. Bathrooms have large bathtubs or showers, and include Acqua di Parma free toiletries, a bathrobe and slippers. Additionally, you can dine al fresco in the Mimosa garden, and discover Terrat, the rooftop terrace, where guests can enjoy cocktails and Peruvian food. Banker's bar is also serves cocktails and tapas. Mandarin Oriental spa offers a wide range of treatments. Spa access is free and includes the indoor pool, hot tub, Hammam and 24-hour gym. The spa also features suites for couples. Headphones, towels and chilled drinks are provided for the gym. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

name: Hotel Nuevo Boston
address: Avenida De Aragon 332, 28022 Madrid
description: Hotel Nuevo Boston is a design hotel, 10-minute drive from IFEMA Exhibition Centre and 5-minute drive from Civitas Metropolitano Stadium. It offers free WiFi and a free airport shuttle service to Madrid’s Barajas Airport, 5-minute drive away. Rooms at the Nuevo Boston hotel are air-conditioned. They include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and the marble bathroom comes with a hairdryer. There is also a safety deposit box and a desk. Hotel Nuevo Boston has a restaurant, serving modern Mediterranean food, and a café-bar. The dining area features a glass roof and palm trees. The hotel operates a shuttle service to IFEMA during trade fairs. Nuevo Boston is adapted for guests with reduced mobility. The hotel has a pool and sun terrace available in the summer.

name: Pestana Plaza Mayor Madrid
address: Calle Imperial, 8, 28002 Madrid
description: Less than 1 km from Mercado San Miguel and a 13-minute walk from Puerta de Toledo, the property offers a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, spa and free WiFi is available. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. The units at Pestana Plaza Mayor Madrid have air conditioning and a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the property. Pestana Plaza Mayor Madrid is located in Plaza Mayor, while Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum is 1.1 km from the property. Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport is 13.8 km away.

name: H10 Puerta de Alcalá
address: Alcala, 66, 28009 Madrid
description: Situated amongst well-known tourist attractions, shops and eateries, H10 Puerta de Alcala is ideal for guests wishing to discover Madrid and its surroundings. It also offers a coffee bar, 24-hour room service and free Wi-Fi. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. For trendy travellers a cocktail bar provides a happy setting for an after-meal drink. H10 Puerta de Alcala features 138 air conditioned rooms. A mini bar, an in-room safe and a private bathroom are also provided. H10 Puerta de Alcala houses La Galeria, which serves breakfast and presents guests with everything they need for an enjoyable night within the hotel. Lunch, afternoon tea and dinner are served daily at Lobby Bar El Mirador. Madrid's attractions, such as the National Archaeological Museum of Spain, the Monument to Alfonso XII and the Puerta de Alcala, are easily accessible on foot from H10 Puerta de Alcala. Principe de Vergara Metro Station is only a two-minute stroll, linking guests with the rest of the city.Revato

name: Novotel Madrid Center
address: O'Donnell 53, 28009 Madrid
description: Novotel Madrid Center is in Madrid's Salamanca district, close to Metro stops and 219 yards from the bus line to Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas Airport. Just 8 minutes' walk from Retiro Park, this elegant hotel has free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms are modern and the conference rooms offer state-of-the-art technology and different adaption and capacity options designed for all kinds of events.accorhotels.com

name: Canopy by Hilton Madrid Castellana
address: Plaza Carlos Trias Beltran 4, 28020 Madrid
description: We’re in the heart of Azca financial district surrounded by restaurants and shops and just a five-minute walk from Real Madrid Santiago Bernabeu Stadium and Paseo de la Castellana. Experience urban gastronomy at Canopy Central or the vibrant Food Truck on our outdoor terrace. A rooftop pool, fully equipped gym and evening tastings complete your stay.Hilton

name: Melia Madrid Princesa
address: Princesa 27, Madrid
description: With views of the Royal Palace, Meliá Princesa is a hotel located in Madrid, 8 minutes’ walk from Plaza España and Gran Via. It offers a gym. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Free access to heated indoor pool for guests. The elegant rooms at the Meliá Madrid Princesa include a safe and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The upper floors of the hotel are dedicated to The Level exclusive rooms, with panoramic views over the city or the mountains as well as specific superior services and facilities such as a wellness area. Guests can enjoy elegant and spacious rooms with pillow menu, private check-in and check-out space, Nespresso space with biodegradable coffee capsules, concierge service, a private area with drinks and snacks, private show cooking, and press in the lounge, among others. Mosaico à la carte restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine using traditional cooking recipes and seasonal products. Guests can also enjoy a hearty buffet breakfast. Complimentary coffee is offered in the early morning from 05:00 to 07:00. There is also a bar integrated in the reception and a 24-hour room service. Oeste Park and the beautiful Debod Temple are 7 minutes’ walk from the Meliá Princesa. Ventura Rodríguez Metro Station, located next to the hotel, provides links to the centre of town in around 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Santo Domingo
address: San Bernardo 1, 28013 Madrid
description: Unique hotel in the heart of Madrid, located in San Bernardo Street, between Gran Va and Callao square. Excellent location, with 200 rooms. Amongst the charms of the Hotel, we highlight the Themed Rooms, the distinctive Lobby, crowned by our porcelain and gold leaf vault, or the Parking, decorated with evocative scenes. We also count with more than 1200m of meeting rooms with natural light, and an outdoor swimming-pool on the roof-terrace, from where the guests can enjoy Madrids best views.iHotelier/iStay

name: Holiday Inn Express Madrid Airport, An IHG Hotel
address: Avenida de Aragón, 402,Ciudad Pegaso, 28022 Madrid
description: Make travel easy with a comfortable stay at our hotel near Barajas Airport Holiday Inn Express Madrid - Airport hotel is only 5 - minutes away from the airport terminals at Madrid Barajas Adolfo Suarez International (MAD) Airport. Direct access to the motorways A2 Barcelona and M21 makes it the ideal start base for wherever you go. Madrid city is only 15 min drive away. Perfect hotel for busi-ness trips also, IFEMA Exhibition Centre is only 10 min drive away. Besides, one of the most important sports facilities in Madrid, the Metropolitano Stadium is just 8 min away by car. No car? No problem, 20 minutes bus ride on the local bus service will whisk you directly into Madrid - Avenida de America. The stop is only 200 metres away from the hotel. Hard day? Relax yourself in our outdoor swimming pool or have a drink in our terrace - bar while you see planes taking off. If mantaining your fitness routine while traveling is a must, work out in our fitness center. Whether you’re staying for business or sightseeing with family, the best way to start your day is with the Express Start Breakfast, included in the room rate. Rest assured that you will sleep well in our comfortable beds with pillow menu, have a refreshing shower or take a complimentary tea in our in-room tea&coffee-making facilities.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Mandarin Oriental Ritz, Madrid
address: Plaza de la Lealtad 5, 28014 Madrid
description: No description found

name: Pestana CR7 Gran Vía
address: Gran Vía 29, 28013 Madrid
description: Pestana CR7 Gran Vía has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and shared lounge in Madrid. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel the rooms have a wardrobe and a private bathroom. Guests at Pestana CR7 Gran Vía Madrid can enjoy breakfast on the outdoor terrace, try an authentic Neapolitan pizza or enjoy a cocktail with panoramic views of Madrid. The accommodation offers a terrace and is the only rooftop with multiple heights and 360° views of Madrid. Popular points of interest near Pestana CR7 Gran Vía include Gran Via, Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Novotel Madrid City Las Ventas
address: Albacete 1, 28027 Madrid
description: Enjoy the best leisure and business offer in Novotel Madrid City Las Ventas, a modern, functional hotel with excellent communication and location. Its spacious, quiet & fully equipped rooms, some overlooking Madrid, offer a perfect rest from work or touring. After a day in one of its eight multipurpose rooms, it's time to relax in the outdoor pool or on the terrace of your fusion restaurant.accorhotels.com

name: Salles Hotel Malaga Centro
address: Marmoles 6, 29007 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Free Wi-Fi and a seasonal rooftop pool with impressive city views can be found at Salles Hotel Málaga Centro, set less than 5 minutes' walk from Málaga’s picturesque old town. Rooms at the Málaga Centro are brightly decorated and spacious. Each room has satellite TV and exterior views. The Málaga Centro’s Alborán Restaurant serves a range of Mediterranean and Andalusian cuisine. The café-bar serves drinks and snacks. Guests can relax and enjoy city views on the Centro’s rooftop terrace. There is a poolside bar, open in summer. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Picasso Museum and less than 1 km from Málaga Cathedral.

name: Room Mate Valeria
address: Plaza Del Poeta Alfonso Canales, 5, 29001 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a courtyard, Room Mate Valeria is 200 metres away from Calle Larios. Free WiFi is available throughout. All air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms in this design hotel include a flat-screen TV with USB and HDMI connection, full-length mirror, minibar, and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer, rain-effect shower and free toiletries. Room Mate Valeria offers a fitness centre and meeting facilities. Breakfast is served until 12:00. Malaga Cathedral is 300 metres away while La Malagueta Beach is 20 minutes’ walk. Malaga Airport is 8 km from Room Mate Valeria.

name: NH Málaga
address: Calle San Jacinto, 2, 29007 Málaga, Andalusia
description: The elegant modern building of the NH Málaga hotel, completely renovated in 2019, is in a prime location and offers its guests lovely views of the famous Esperanza church. A short 15-minute walk from the hotel takes you to the stunning Spanish beaches and the Muelle 1 shopping center. You can also explore further afield as the train station is near to the hotel. The rooms at NH Málaga ensure deep comfortable sleep with soundproof windows and allow you to stay connected throughout your trip with free Wi-Fi. Each room is outward facing with views over Malaga, the river, or the Esperanza church. The breakfast is spectacular and filling, with a wide range of fresh and healthy options, including cooked-to-order eggs, cold cuts, cheeses, and fresh pastries. For a special experience with a new gastronomic concept, head to our hotel restaurant, Tablafina, a place where you can enjoy good wine with quality tapas. Snacks and drinks can be enjoyed at the Cafeteria Bar. You can also unwind with a glass of delicious local wine on our terrace. The hotel has a gym for workouts and an outdoor pool for relaxation. Meetings or conferences can be easily accommodated in one of our 14 rooms, the largest of which can hold over to 1,500 people.NH Hoteles

name: Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito
address: Avenida Del Lido S/N, Málaga, Andalusia
description: The Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito is situated in Torremolinos, 100 meters from Playamar and Bajondillo beaches and the seaside promenade. A swimming pool, hot tub and free hammam are featured. Their air-conditioned and heated rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, kettle, coffee maker, safe and minibar. The private bathroom includes hair dryer, bathrobe, shower and free toiletries. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, sun terrace, a hot tub and a turkish bath. Their buffet restaurant offers a range of culinary options. Free WiFi is featured. The Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito is within easy reach of all kinds of attractions, places of interest and the renowned nightlife. Malaga Airport is 12 minutes drive away.

name: Hotel Malaga Picasso
address: Calle Acacias de Guadalmar, 153, 29620 Torremolinos, Andalusia
description: The Málaga Picasso Hotel is set near Guadalmar Beach and just 2.5 km from Málaga Airport. An outdoor swimming pool and a hot tub are set within attractive gardens. Free WiFi is provided. Rooms at the hotel are simply decorated and feature air conditioning and tiled, terracotta floors. Rooms have access to the gardens and swimming pool. The Málaga Picasso has a lounge and terrace where guests can sit and relax. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. The Parador de Málaga Golf Resort is just over 1 km from the Picasso and the Aqualand Water Park is 5 km away. Málaga Picasso is close to public transport links to Málaga city centre, 5km away. Attractions include the Moorish castle, the Alcazaba and the Cathedral. The city also has many museums, shops and restaurants.

name: Gloria Palace Amadores Thalasso & Hotel
address: La Palma, 2, 35139 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Gloria Palace Amadores is set on a cliff top, between Gran Canaria’s Puerto Rico and Amadores Beaches. This luxury spa hotel offers 2 outdoor pools and spectacular Atlantic Ocean views. Gloria Palace, one of the largest thalasotheraphy centres in Europe, offers a seawater pool, massage and various treatments. There is a sauna, Turkish bath and physiotherapy pool. Air-conditioned rooms have a private balcony with sea views. There is satellite TV, and you can hire the safe and minibar. Guests have access to free Wi-Fi in their room and throughout the hotel. Tennis coaching is available on the floodlit tennis court. There is a gym, and you can play table tennis, bowls, archery and darts. Children have their own swimming pool, playground and mini-club. Evening shows are provided for both adults and children. Amadores has a buffet restaurant with show cooking and nightly themed buffets are offered. There are several bars, including a piano bar and pool bar. Gloria Palace has a 24-hour reception and offers car hire. Free parking is offered.

name: Servatur Puerto Azul
address: Avda. de la Cornisa, 13, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: When you stay at Servatur Puerto Azul in Mogan, you'll be by the ocean, a 3-minute drive from Amadores Beach and 8 minutes from Puerto Rico Marina. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort & Spa
address: Mar Mediterraneo 1, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Set 800 metres from Gran Canaria’s Maspalomas Beach, this luxury complex features a spa, casino and heated lagoon-style swimming pools set in tropical gardens. Each room has a private balcony. Rooms at the Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort & Spa are spacious and elegant, with marble floors and air conditioning. They all have satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and bathrobes. The Costa Meloneras Resort’s stylish Ambassador restaurant serves nouvelle cuisine. The complex also offers buffet restaurants, cafés and a cocktail bar. The Lopesan Spa offers a hydrotherapy circuit and salt grotto. A wide range of wellness treatments is available. The complex also features an artificial beach and sun terraces with loungers. Situated next to Maspalomas Lighthouse, the Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort is a 10-minute walk from Maspalomas Dunes. The hotel offers a free shuttle service to Meloneras Golf Course, just 1.5km away.

name: H10 Playa Meloneras Palace
address: Mar Caspio, 5, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: H10 Playa Meloneras Palace is next to Meloneras Beach and Golf Course in southern Gran Canaria. It has 3 swimming pools, a sun terrace, spa and striking design inspired by Antoni Gaudí. The rooms at the H10 Meloneras feature tiled floors and typical Mediterranean décor. They all come with a private balcony and satellite TV. The hotel’s Tamadaba buffet restaurant offers show cooking and international food. Gaudí Restaurant serves à la carte meals, and there is also a poolside bar-café and 2 other bars. Leisure facilities at the H10 Gran Canaria include tennis courts and a mini club for children. The lively resort of Playa del Inglés is around 10 minutes’ drive from the Hotel Playa Meloneras. Gran Canaria Airport is just 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: H10 Atlantic Sunset
address: Avenida Adeje 300 Playa Paraiso, 38678 Callao Salvaje, Tenerife
description: No description found

name: Abora Interclub Atlantic By Lopesan Hotels
address: Calle Los Jazmines, 2, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This all-inclusive club is located in the higher part of San Agustín, nestled in a 10 acre park boasting fantastic panoramic views of the Atlantic and the vast Maspalomas sand dunes. The complex boasts 168 double rooms plus 240 family rooms with capacity for up to 4 people. Many have sea views, though those with views over the spacious gardens are not less privileged. In the gardens themselves it is always possible to find a spot to place a sun lounger and relax under the palm trees. All roms are equipped with direct telephone, Satellite TV, Safe, Sofa, Bathroom with bath and WC and Balcony or terrace. Traditional Sports enthusiasts area catered well at the club with multi-functional sports facilities including 4 tennis courts and sport grounds. You are also sure to be tempted by the nearby San Agustín beach or one of the 2 onsite outdoor pools, to cool off with a refreshing dip. The complex also boasts a first-class entertainment team that makes sure the day is full of games, group sports, music and evening shows. During the summer months, children have their own mini club and there is a special programme of activities for young teenagersWebBeds

name: Abora Buenaventura By Lopesan Hotels
address: C/ Ganigo, 6 Plaza De Ansite, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Abora Buenaventura by Lopesan Hotels is located 500 metres from the beach in Playa del Inglés, on Gran Canaria’s south coast. It has 2 outdoor pool surrounded by palm trees, a children's pool and a hot tub. Free WiFi is provided. A varied entertainment programme for adults and children is offered at the Abora Buenaventura. Guests can enjoy a gym for free. All rooms at the Abora Buenaventura have a private balcony with garden or pool views. There is a TV with free channels, and you can hire a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Abora Buenaventura by Lopesan Hotels has 1 buffet restaurant and a snack & go bar. There are also 2 poolside bars and 2 bars. There is a 24-hour reception offering car hire and currency exchange. The hotel has a beauty salon and various shops on-site.

name: Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria, Mogan
address: Avenida Los Marrero 35, 35140 Puerto de Mogan, Gran Canaria
description: This property is 10 minutes far from the beach. Featuring an on-site fitness centre and a spa, Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Mogan, Gran Canaria is located in Puerto de Mogan. This resort offers 2 swimming pools with a hot tub, as well as 1 pool for children. All spacious, air-conditioned rooms and suites at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan have modern décor and large balconies or terraces. There is a seating area with satellite TV and Apple TV, free WiFi and a bathroom with a bathrobe and slippers. The spa features an indoor pool with water jets, a hot tub, sauna and a Turkish bath. Massages and a range of beauty treatments are also available. The main restaurant Larder offers themed buffet dinners and pre-show dining, while the à-la-carte Filini restaurant serves international fine dining cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a drink and snacks from the Pool Bar II Taglio, as well as from the Pool Lounge. Other facilities at the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Mogan, Gran Canaria include a rock climbing tower, a tennis and volleyball court, and a running track. An array of activities are offered in the area, such as snorkelling, diving and cycling. Maspalomas is 18 km from Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Mogan, Gran Canaria, while Las Palmas de Gran Canaria is 46 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 38 km from Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Mogan, Gran Canaria.

name: NH Las Palmas Playa Las Canteras
address: Prudencio Morales, 41, 35009 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Abundant sunshine, sea breezes, and crashing ocean waves await guests when they stay at the Canary Islands’ NH Las Palmas Playa Las Canteras hotel. Situated just steps from Las Canteras beach in La Puntilla area of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, the hotel is perfect for sunbathers, swimmers, and oceanfront relaxation-seekers. Formerly NH Playa Las Canteras, the hotel is just one block from the Albareda (Mercado del Puerto) bus stop, giving guests easy access to Las Palmas’ town center. The historic districts of Vegueta and Triana can also be reached via public transit, connecting guests to some of the best shopping, eateries, and nightlife venues in Las Palmas. Luz Castle is a short walk from the hotel, and the Alfredo Kraus Auditorium, Colón Museum and Canarias Cathedral are a short drive away. The hotel offers 67 welcoming rooms furnished with luxurious mattresses, satellite TV, and a mini-bar. Several rooms can be arranged with three beds to accommodate families. Hotel guests can enjoy the breakfast buffet with beach views served next door at the sister hotel, NH Imperial Playa. NH Imperial Playa also houses a restaurant specializing in seafood and a seafront bar. Guests seeking extra beach time may request a complimentary “Lazy Sunday” checkout at 3 pm, and there's also a gym on-site to help you stay in shape.NH Hoteles

name: Abora Catarina by Lopesan Hotels
address: Avenida de Tirajana, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Abora Catarina by Lopesan is located in Playa del Inglés, 250 metres from the Maspalomas Sand Dunes. This hotel features a buffet restaurant, bars, 5 outdoor swimming pools, and fitness centre. All rooms have air conditioning, TV, telephone and sofa bed. The Double Family Pool and Double Deluxe Pool rooms have a terrace and private pool. The Double Superior room with hydromassage and terrace and the Double Garden room have a terrace with garden view. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and a shared terrace. Guests can also enjoy the games room and there is a playground for children. Gran Canarias Airport is located a 20-minute drive from Abora Catarina by Lopesan, and the city of Las Palmas is 55 km away.

name: Occidental Jandía Mar
address: C/ Playa Del Jable, 35625 Pájara, Fuerteventura
description: When you stay at Occidental Jandía Mar in Pajara, you'll be near the beach, within a 15-minute walk of Las Gaviotas beach and Matorral Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Pajara? This hotel has 10204 square feet (948 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hotel Landmar Playa La Arena
address: Lajial 4, 38683 Santiago del Teide, Tenerife
description: This hotel is located 50 metres from the volcanic sands of La Arena beach, on Tenerife’s Santiago del Teide Coast. The hotel features an outdoor pool and rooms with balconies. The rooms at Landmar Playa La Arena are spacious and brightly decorated. All rooms have air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom. A safe is available for a surcharge. The facilities include a tennis court, mini golf and table tennis. Landmar Playa La Arena is situated in the resort of Puerto de Santiago. The hotel is a 45-minute drive from Mount Teide National Park and Tenerife South Airport.

name: Seaside Sandy Beach
address: Av. Menceyes, 1, Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This Arabic-style hotel offers free WiFi, tennis courts and an outdoor swimming pool with jets, surrounded by subtropical gardens. Playa del Inglés Beach is just 500 metres away. Seaside Sandy Beach’s spacious, air-conditioned rooms include satellite TV and a furnished balcony. Hairdryers and bathrobes are available on request. Guests can enjoy wonderful ocean views from the outdoor gym. There is also a Hammam, sauna and massages service. A private terrace with a hot tub is also available to hire. Sandy Beach has an air-conditioned buffet restaurant and meals can also be served on the beautiful garden terrace. There is also a poolside snack bar and an on-site bakery. Coffee and cakes are served in the afternoon. The hotel is located in central Playa del Inglés, within a 10-minute walk of popular Yumbo Shopping Centre. Maspalomas Golf Course is only 1.5 km away.

name: Hotel Eugenia Victoria & Spa
address: Avda. de Gran Canaria, 26, Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Eugenia Victoria is 10 minutes’ walk from the centre of Gran Canaria’s lively Playa del Inglés. It offers a free beach shuttle bus, and has an outdoor pool and spa. Rooms at Eugenia Victoria have free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private balcony with views of the gardens. There is a living room with a small fridge, and all rooms have a private bathroom. A safe is available to hire. The hotel spa includes a hot tub, Finnish sauna, Turkish bath and an indoor swimming pool. Massage, physiotherapy and beauty treatments are offered. The Eugenia Victoria has a buffet restaurant and poolside snack bar. There are 3 bars onsite, including a poolside bar and a terrace bar with live music every night. There is a 24-hour front desk and a free Wi-Fi zone. Free parking is available on-site.

name: Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa
address: Urbanización Costa Del Papagayo, 35580 Arrecife, Lanzarote
description: Located in Playa Blanca, Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa offers beachfront accommodation 200 metres from Playa Dorada and provides various facilities, such as a bar, a shared lounge and a garden. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also features with a restaurant, a water park and a year-round outdoor pool. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and room service. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a rain shower. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada. The accommodation offers a children playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa. A car rental service is available at the property. Playa Blanca is less than 1 km from the hotel, while Flamingo Beach is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Lanzarote, 35 km from Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bahia Principe Sunlight San Felipe
address: Avenida de Colon, 22, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Bahia Principe San Felipe is located on the seafront, just 400 metres from the Martíanez Lakes. It offers a spa, tennis courts, and heated outdoor pools set in subtropical gardens. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms are tastefully decorated, and most have views of El Teide Volcano or the Atlantic Ocean. Each room has satellite TV and a private bathroom. The buffet restaurant offers international cuisine, while Italian and Mediterranean dishes are served in the 2 à la carte restaurants. You can relax with a drink from the poolside bar. Bahia Principe San Felipe’s spa includes an indoor pool, gym, sauna and hot tub. A range of relaxing massages and beauty treatments are available. The hotel is situated in central Puerto de la Cruz, a 25-minute walk from Playa Jardín Beach. Limited parking places are available under an additional cost. Not possible to book in advance. Tenerife Norte Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Oasis Lanz Beach Mate
address: Avenida Del Jablillo, 5, 35508 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Oasis Lanz Beach Mate has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and garden in Costa Teguise. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The air-conditioned rooms provide pool view and come with a wardrobe and free WiFi. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area. Guests at Oasis Lanz Beach Mate can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. You can play table tennis and tennis at Oasis Lanz Beach Mate, and car hire is available. Speaking German, English, French and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Playa del Jablillo is 300 metres from the hotel, while Aqua Park is 2 km from the property.

name: Abora Continental By Lopesan Hotels
address: Avenida de Italia, 2, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Situated in the centre of the lively Playa del Inglés resort, the hotel is just a few minutes’ walk from a 6 km stretch of beach that extends up to Maspalomas. Abora Continental by Lopesan Hotels features a cheerful and relaxed ambience and many of its comfortable rooms have sea views. There are 2 swimming pools for adults, a children’s pool and four hot tubs. Daytime and evening entertainment is available.

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Mar
address: Avenida de El Castillo, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Quality and comfort with a Canary Island soulThe Barcelo Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa hotel is built on Caleta de Fuste Beach. Basking in the tranquillity of the bay it offers the perfect destination for unwinding with the family. Its proximity to the marina also makes El Castillo a great place to discover new sports and leisure.It has 462 rooms that are spacious and full of natural light in a modern functional style. The rooms are also fully equipped so that guests have everything they need to enjoy their holiday to the full. Parents have the tranquillity of taking their children to the modern childrens miniclub that has a pirate theme or to the magnificent theatre with daily shows. Couples and groups of friends can enjoy the endless variety of water sports and outdoor activities on offer as well as the hotel restaurants bars and its famous thalassotherapy centre unique in Fuerteventura where they can have the latest type of treatments. The Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa is designed so that its guests can discover new experiences while they enjoy the beautiful surroundings peaceful beaches and welcoming locals or while they simply sit back and enjoy their holiday in this privileged location.Barcelo.com

name: H10 Rubicón Palace
address: Urb. Montaña Roja, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: H10 Rubicón Palace is set in white-washed buildings around a lagoon-style pool in the Lanzarote fishing village of Playa Blanca. Overlooking La Mulata Beach, it features a spa and 10 restaurants and bars. Each air-conditioned room at the H10 Rubicon Palace Hotel is spacious and bright. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. Guests can hire beach towels at reception. Two buffet restaurants offer show cooking and themed dinners. À la carte options include The Steakhouse, which offers American specialties; the Dolce Vita features Italian cuisine and Sakura serves fusion-oriental cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the Piano Bar, Sports Bar, Mike's Coffee, or La Choza pool bar. The Despacio Spa has an indoor pool with hydromassage beds, Turkish baths and a sauna. There is also a gym and treatment booths. For children there are clubs for different ages, with entertainment provided, as well as Daisy Adventure, which offers a pirate ship and water games. There are regular ferries to the neighboring island of Fuerteventura from Playa Blanca Port, 10 minutes’ drive from the Hotel H10 Rubicon Palace.

name: Landmar Costa Los Gigantes
address: Calle Juan Manuel Capdevielle, 8, 38683 Santiago del Teide, Tenerife
description: Located in Puerto de Santiago, 1.1 km from Playa de Santiago, Landmar Costa los Gigantes offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel provides an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, nightclub and a kids' club. At the hotel every room comes with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bath, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Landmar Costa los Gigantes every room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegetarian and gluten-free options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis, mini-golf and tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Popular points of interest near Landmar Costa los Gigantes include La Arena Beach, Puerto Santiago Beach and Los Gigantes Beach. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 41 km from the hotel.

name: Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa
address: Calle Gran Bretana, Costa Adeje, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa is located in Adeje’s coast, offering spectacular views of the Atlantic Ocean and La Gomera. The luxurious facilities include 12,000 m2 of gardens. Each elegant room has a balcony or terrace with outdoor furniture, flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, and safe. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower and hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout. There is an a-la-carte and a buffet restaurant on site, as well as a snack bar and several lounges. The nearest beach is 400 metres from Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa. Siam Park is a 3-minute drive from the property, and Tenerife Sur Airport is 15 minutes away by car. - The establishment offers Preferred Club®, with preferential status and exclusive services such as: - access to the Preferred Club Lounge with a selection of snacks and drinks during the day, - exclusive concierge service, selection of the best rooms including superior attributes, - among other special advantages.

name: H10 Taburiente Playa
address: Calle de Los Cancajos, 36, 38712 Breña Baja, La Palma
description: Hotel Taburiente Playa is 300 metres from Los Carcajos Beach, on La Palma’s east coast. It offers 3 outdoor pools and free parking, as well as a sauna and tennis courts. All air-conditioned rooms at H10 Taburiente Playa have a private balcony and satellite TV. A safe is available for an extra charge. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The hotel’s buffet restaurant offers show cooking and serves international food. There are also 3 bars, including a poolside snack bar and a salon bar with live music. Room service and packed lunches are available. The coastline around the hotel is popular for scuba diving, and there is a diving centre next door. You can drive to La Palma Airport and Santa Cruz de La Palma, the island’s capital, in 10 minutes.

name: Barceló Tenerife
address: Avd. Grenamora, No. 1, Urb. San Blas, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Barcelo Tenerife has 331 fully equipped rooms; a buffet restaurant; La Proa gourmet restaurant; four bars and the Magma performance hall. It also includes other original proposals for leisure and rest such as a navigable lake; a climbing wall; a gym; a recreational sports area with a beach volleyball court; basketball; handball and paddle tennis; eight swimming pools /two of which are heated throughout the year/ and a Wellness areaBarcelo.com

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Royal Level
address: Avenida Del Castillo, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: The perfect place to rest.The Barcelo Castillo Royal Level is located right on the beachfront at Caleta de Fuste in Fuerteventura where you can enjoy relaxing walks by the sea with the best views of the Atlantic. The tranquillity of the area and the beauty of the beach make it the perfect destination for families and groups of friends wanting to combine rest with fun during their holidays. There is a marina in the area offering a large range of water sports such as Jet Skis Windsurfing and a Diving School. There are 30 bright spacious apartments with fully equipped modern kitchens. Guests have the added benefit of being on the Barcelo Castillo Beach Resort complex and being able to enjoy all the facilities on offer as well as the Thalassotherapy Centre in the Barcelo Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa. Discover the best local gastronomy in our recently opened restaurant.Barcelo.com

name: Princesa Yaiza Suite Hotel Resort
address: Avenida de Papagayo, 22, 35570 Yaiza, Lanzarote
description: The Hotel Yaiza Suite Hotel Resort is set on the beachfront in Playa Blanca. This resort features 6 outdoor swimming pools, a Thalasso and spa centre, sports facilities and 8 restaurants. Each room at the Hotel Yaiza Suite Hotel Resort has a balcony or patio with sea views, or overlooking the pools or the gardens. All include a small kitchenette, flat-screen TV, and a bathrobe and slippers. A safe is available for a surcharge. Guests can enjoy the Thousand and One Nights seawater circuit at Hotel Yaiza’s Thalassotherapy centre for an extra charge. Hydro-massage jets, swan-necks, underwater music and color therapy are also available here, as well as a Turkish bath, treatment cabins, and a tea house. The fitness center has sports classes and a sauna free of charge. The restaurants at Hotel Yaiza Suite Resort serve buffet and individual choice cuisine. Mexican, Italian, Japanese and gourmet Spanish cuisine is offered within the resort. There is also a tapas and a poolside snack bar.

name: Hotel Puerto Palace
address: c/ Dr, Cobiella Zaera s.n., 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Hotel Puerto Palace features accommodation with gardens and terraces. The property has three swimming pools along with a kid's pool. All rooms come with a private balcony, a flat-screen TV and a mini fridge. Private bathroom is fitted with a hairdryer and a magnifying mirror. Buffet breakfast is available at the property. Guest can also enjoy dinner at the restaurant and a bar with live music at night. The property boasts a massage parlour along with activities including mini-golf, table tennis and a volleyball. A fitness centre and a tennis court are available at an additional charge. Hotel Puerto Palace is located about 1 km from Playa Jardin Beach and 1.5 km from Botanical Gardens and Loro Park.

name: Lopesan Baobab Resort
address: Mar Adriático, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Lopesan Baobab Resort is a luxurious resort set in tropical gardens with African-style decór throughout. It features a large outdoor swimming pool and is 600 metres from Maspalomas Beach. Rooms at the Lopesan are elegant and spacious. All feature air conditioning and a balcony. The bathrooms have toiletries and bathrobes. A safe is available for a surcharge. The Baobab’s Pili Pili Restaurant specialises in grilled meats and seafood, while the Akara offers African cuisine. There is a buffet restaurant, as well as 2 stylish poolside bars and a coffee shop. The Lopesan also has a children's club and a babysitting service. The hotel's 24-hour reception provides luggage storage. The Baobab Resort offers impressive views of the Atlantic Ocean. It is just 10 minutes’ walk from Maspalomas lighthouse and the seafront path.

name: Gf Gran Costa Adeje
address: Avenida de Bruselas, 16, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: The 5-star GF GRAN COSTA ADEJE is set 500 metres from El Duque Beach, in Tenerife’s Playa de Fañabe resort. It offers a spa and free parking on site. Rooms at the hotel have a balcony with views of the mountains, pool or sea. They are also equipped with air conditioning. The GF GRAN COSTA ADEJE has 3 swimming pools, surrounded by a sun terrace and tropical gardens, and a roof top pool for adults, offering panoramic views of the Costa Adeje and Fañabe Beach. There are 2 exclusive areas for naturist use. The hotel’s spa has a sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. There is also a gym and outside the hotel guests can find mini golf and tennis courts. The hotel has a buffet restaurant, 2 à la carte restaurants and 3 bars. There is a full entertainment programme, with live shows and games. Tenerife South Airport is just 20 km from the hotel.

name: Iberostar Bouganville Playa
address: Calle San Eugenio Dominguez, 23, 38660 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz De Tenerife, Spain, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Iberostar Bouganville Playa is situated on the seafront promenade of San Eugenio, just 200 metres from the Playa del Bobo Beach. Rooms enjoy sea views from their private terrace. Free premium high speed WiFi is available throughout the property. The hotel features 3 outdoor pools surrounded by a sun terrace with loungers. It also includes a gym. Diving and snorkelling are popular in the area. The main restaurant at Iberostar Bouganville Playa serves traditional Canarian and international cuisine. The hotel also features a pool bar. Puerto Colón Marina is located nearby where guests can enjoy boat trips and fishing excursions. The nearest golf course is 3 km away. There is free limited public parking nearby.

name: Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife
address: Avenida de Adeje 300, s/n, 38678 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Featuring an on-site night club and a beauty salon, Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife is located in Adeje and boasts 5-star accommodation. Guests also have exclusive access to the Rock Spa® and Superstar Pools. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Facilities include complimentary wireless internet, an outdoor pool and outdoor tennis courts. The hotel also has its very own gym, Hard Rock Roxity Kids Club ™. Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife offers 624 rooms, all of which are fitted with an iPod docking station, a rain shower and a mini bar. Hot drinks can be brewed with the provided coffee and tea supplies. There is also a private balcony, an in-room safe and a flat-screen TV. Guests of the hotel are invited to sample seafood cuisine at Montauk, or try seafood and Asian meals at Narumi. Dining options at the hotel include Constant Grind Coffee Shop & Bar and Sessions. Other dining options are also available. Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife is within easy reach of Adeje’s popular restaurants, clubs and nightlife. For those with a car, parking is available on site and Costa Adeje is a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Seaside Los Jameos Playa
address: Playa De Los Pocillos, Calle Marte,2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Situated on Los Pocillos Beach, the Canarian-style Los Jameos Playa offers outdoor pools surrounded by palm trees and 4 tennis courts. It features a small Finnish spa with a gym, bio-sauna and Turkish Bath. Each spacious air-conditioned room at Seaside Los Jameos has a balcony and is decorated with soft colours and light wood furniture. They include satellite TV, and minibars and safes can be rented. The main restaurant, with its beautiful covered terrace, offers a varied buffet dinner, with special themes and BBQ nights. The Belingo Bar offers a animated entertainment programme with live music and dancing. Los Jameos Lanzarote offers daily activities for adults and children, including minigolf and beach volleyball. There are also games and activities for children. Several bars, restaurants and shops are within 10 minutes’ walk away. Los Jameos Playa Hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Matagorda, and 2 km from central Puerto del Carmen. Lanzarote Arrecife Airport is just 5 km away. There is a golf course less than 3 km away.

name: Spring Hotel Bitácora
address: c/ California 1, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Set on Playa de las Americas Beach, Hotel Bitácora is located in Santa Cruz de Tenerife. Offering a varied food buffet, the air-conditioned hotel has sea views. Each bright room features a flat-screen TV and balcony with views. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. There is a bar and a restaurant available for guests, as well as an entertainment staff. Hotel Bitácora has an outdoor swimming pool and furnished terrace. Las Americas Golf Course is 2 km away. Los Cristianos Port is within the same distance offering ferries. Teide National Park is 15 km from the property and Santa Cruz is a 45-minute drive. Tenerife South Airport is located within 20 minutes’ drive.

name: Gara Suites Golf & Spa
address: Calle Landa 2, 38650 Arona, Tenerife
description: Located in Playa de las Americas, 1 km from Siam Park, Gara Suites Golf & Spa offers amenities including an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Offering a garden, the property is located within 1.3 km of Piramide de Arona convention centre. The tour desk is available to assist guests in planning their days out. Featuring a terrace, all guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the property. There is an in-house restaurant, which serves a variety of Mediterranean dishes. Gara Suites Golf & Spa offers a children's playground. Speaking German and English, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Safari Shopping Centre is a 16-minute walk from the accommodation, while Chayofa is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 14 km from the property.

name: Gf Victoria
address: Calle Fernando Lopez Arvelo, 1, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Located in Costa Adeje just 150 m from Playa del Duque Beach, GF Victoria offers 4 bathing areas and 2 restaurants. Free private parking is available on site. The 242 Suites offer a bedroom with ensuite bathroom, lounge area with separate WC, kettle, coffee-maker and minibar. Smart TV, safety deposit box, air-conditioning and amenities are provided. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Guests will find an adult pool, a family area and naturist pool on the property. GF Victoria also features a glass pool, with transparent walls and bottom which overhangs the façade of the hotel. Children will enjoy the aquatic park, which includes a surf pool. Guests will find sun loungers service. The wide gastronomic offer includes the cuisine of the à la carte restaurant Donaire, and the buffet restaurant Chaboco, where children can learn about healthy food choices. Guests can visit the chill-out Sky Bar Zambra only for adults. Plaza del Duque Shopping Centre is a 2-minute walk from the accommodation, while Gran Sur Shopping Centre is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 17 km from GF Victoria.

name: HD Beach Resort
address: Avenida Islas Canarias, s/n, 35509 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Located 250 metres from Las Cucharas Beach, on Lanzarote’s Costa Teguise, HD Beach Resort offers tennis courts, gym, spa and outdoor pool. The spa includes an indoor pool, sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. Air-conditioned suites have a balcony with views of the Atlantic Ocean or mountains. There is a seating area with a sofa bed, safe and flat-screen satellite TV. A fridge, toaster and coffee maker are provided, and a microwave is available on request. The HD Beach Resort features 2 restaurants. It also has a bar and snack bar, and packed lunches can be requested. The complex has free Wi-Fi and on-site water sports facilities. There is a night club and entertainment staff. Free parking is offered nearby, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. An airport shuttle service is available for a supplement.

name: Sol Tenerife
address: Avenida Rafael Puig Llivina, 12, 38640 Arona, Tenerife
description: Sol Tenerife is located 200 metres from the beach in Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas Resort. It offers 3 outdoor pools with sun loungers, a tennis court and rooms with a furnished balcony with partial or front sea views. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Sol Tenerife feature tiled floors and cheerful colours. They are equipped with satellite TV, fridge, desk and chair. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. There is free WiFi available in all areas of the hotel. The hotel has a kids' club, hairdressers and supermarket on site. Sports facilities include a volleyball court and a small football pitch. There is also a massage service. The Tenerife Sol’s restaurant serves international buffet meals. There are also 2 bars, including a poolside bar. Las Américas Golf Course is 500 metres away from the hotel. Tenerife Sur Airport is 14 km away. You can take a boat to La Gomera Island in 35 minutes.

name: H10 Conquistador
address: Avenida Rafael Puig, 36, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: H10 Conquistador is situated on Tenerife and offers 4-star accommodation as well as outdoor tennis courts and a Turkish steam bath. This modern hotel is close to everything Playa de las Americas has to offer. There are a range of facilities at H10 Conquistador that guests can enjoy, such as body treatments, a swimming pool and a golf course. The hotel's amenities, such as meeting rooms, kids pool, kids club and playground, and massage make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. After a day of exploring the nearby area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. All provide a mini bar, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. H10 Conquistador is within walking distance of Playa de las Vistas. The hotel's multilingual staff will make sure that every guest has a comfortable stay.Revato

name: Tivoli la Caleta Resort
address: C/la Enramada 9, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Immerse yourself in luxury at Tivoli La Caleta Tenerife Resort, the first Tivoli property to open in Spain. A fully renewed property, the hotel benefits from an astonishing seafront setting in Tenerife’s exclusive Costa Adeje resort. The hotel itself has a distinctive southern Moroccan style that includes sensual lines and soft edges. Inside, guests will find 284 guest rooms and suites that have been designed as inviting spaces. During their stay, guests will enjoy use of a luxurious collection of leisure facilities, including three swimming pools, a 24-hour gym, a spa, paddle/tennis courts and a terrace with gardens. A dining destination in itself, Tivoli La Caleta Tenerife Resort provides guests with a fantastic selection of food and beverage options, including four restaurants and five bars. From the signature Tivoli Breakfast Buffet to the widest cocktail offering in the area and the three restaurants signed by Olivier, guests will find an option that suits their cravings at any time of day.NH Hoteles

name: Sbh Monica Beach Resort
address: Avenida Ltu 1 (Also Avenida Jahn Reisen ), Costa Calma, Pajara, Fuerteventura, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: Metres from Fuerteventura's beautiful Costa Calma coastline and stunning beaches, this hotel has bedrooms overlooking the gardens or the Atlantic Ocean. Enjoy entertainment, 3 pools and fine dining. Set in 77,000 m², the SBH Monica Beach Resort enjoys a fabulous setting for enjoying Fuerteventura's sun, sea and sand. Take part in the entertainment programme which also performs live music and children's activities. Kids will also make new friends in the mini club. All the SBH Monica Beach Resort bedrooms boast a private balcony or terrace. Each one comes with satellite TV, a mini-fridge and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Stay active this holiday with a game of tennis, a challenging workout in the SBH Mónica's gym or a surf lesson. Then treat yourself to a massage or a session in the sauna, available for an extra cost. After a buffet meal head to the bar for a delicious cocktail. You can also enjoy afternoon tea and biscuits in the cafe.

name: Relaxia Lanzaplaya
address: Calle México no 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Set in the Puerto del Carmen resort, this apartment complex is set overlooking the beach. It offers outdoor pools for adults and children, surrounded by sun terraces and loungers. The attractive apartments feature a private balcony or terrace. They come with a well-equipped kitchen and a lounge area with satellite TV. Relaxia Lanzaplaya offers a buffet restaurant, which often hosts themed dinners. Light meals are available from the poolside snack bar. Facilities at Lanzaplaya include ping pong and billiards. The lounge-bar has a TV with international channels. Located in the south of Lanzarote, the resort of Puerto del Carmen has many bars, restaurants and shops. Lanzarote Airport is 10 km away.

name: H10 Tindaya
address: Punta Del Roquito, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: Set on the beautiful, white sandy beaches of the Costa Calma, this hotel is an ideal spot to enjoy a sunny break in Fuerteventura. This new hotel has been built in a modern, Canarian style and is set around 3 outdoor swimming pools. When not relaxing in the pool or on one of the sun loungers beside it you can head to the hotel’s spa centre for a session of pampering. Here you can enjoy a dip in the hydromassage or indoor pool, experience showers, a sauna, and a range of massage and beauty treatments. Out in the sunshine, you can have fun playing mini-golf whilst children enjoy themselves at the mini club. Then, round off the day with a meal at the buffet restaurant and drink at the bar.

name: Bakour Lanzarote Splash
address: Avenida Juan Carlos I, 35, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: The privileged location of this hotel, only 10 minutes' walk from Playa de Puerto del Carmen Beach, provides a large number of services nearby. This is ideal accommodation to relax as a family and see the island. The apartments are modern, functional and fully-equipped and are of either one or two rooms. There is also an attractive swimming pool for adults and children, with a hydro-massage facility. WiFi is available in areas and carries a surcharge. In the region there is a varied gourmet offering, in particular, in the old town of Tiñosa with its local atmosphere. On the island you can go on numerous excursions to visit the impressive landscapes and the magnificent cultural centres designed by César Manrique. Situated 1.8 km from Lanzarote Golf Resort, Bakour Lanzarote Splash features rooms with air conditioning in Puerto del Carmen. The property is located 2.9 km from Rancho Texas Park, 13 km from Campesino Monument and 19 km from Montañas de Fuego Mountains. Costa Teguise Golf Course is 21 km away and Lagomar Museum is 23 km from the hotel. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Parque Nacional de Timanfaya is 24 km from Bakour Lanzarote Splash, while Jardí­n de Cactus Gardens is 29 km from the property. *For reservations of five rooms or more, special conditions may apply in case of cancellation. *Information note: During November of 2023, some maintenance work will be carried out in the water parks. The main pool and one of the two parks will always remain available, as well as all other hotel facilities and services, which will continue running as usual.

name: Hd Parque Cristobal Tenerife
address: Rafael Puig Lluvina, 15, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: This extensive holiday complex offers spacious bungalow accommodation in the heart of Playa de las Américas, just 200 metres from the beaches of southern Tenerife. Enjoy a relaxing and fun family break in the year-round sunshine of this unique Canary Island with a stay at the Parque Cristóbal Tenerife. Its tropical gardens surround 2 huge outdoor swimming pools for adults, both heated in winter. Children can enjoy themselves in the supervised mini club or their own 2 swimming pools. Alternatively, stay active with a game on the tennis court or a session in the gym. Each apartment opens onto a private terrace and features a well-equipped kitchen.

name: Grupotel Flamingo Beach
address: AV. de Las Canarias, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Located in Playa Blanca in the Lanzarote region and Flamingo Beach reachable within 300 metres, Grupotel Flamingo Beach provides accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, an outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchen, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and Full English/Irish options. The aparthotel offers 2-star accommodation with a fitness room and sun terrace. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Grupotel Flamingo Beach. La Campana Beach is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Playa Blanca is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Lanzarote Airport, 30 km from Grupotel Flamingo Beach.

name: Elba Carlota Beach & Convention
address: Avenida de Las Marismas 3, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: Elba Carlota Beach & Convention Resort is set within Fuerteventura Golf Club and a few metres from the beach. This resort features a casino, 2 outdoor swimming pools, sports facilities and 2 restaurants. Rooms at the Elba Carlota are spacious and bright. All rooms are air conditioned and have a minibar and satellite TV. The resort offers guests a wide range of dining options, including Tindaya Buffet Restaurant and El Arrecife Restaurant, which serves Italian dishes. The Chiringuito Restaurant and Bar is set on a small island opposite the hotel and serves seafood cuisine. The Elba features a heated swimming pool, a hot tub and gym. There are beach volley ball courts, tennis courts and a shooting range. There is also evening entertainment for adults and daytime activities arranged for children. Gran Casino Antigua Fuerteventura is located inside the hotel. It offers a range of games including Roulette, Black Jack and Texas Hold 'Em. The Costa Calma is an ideal location for activities such as golf, sailing and surfing.

name: Los Olivos Beach Resort
address: Paris, 1, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: With a stay at Los Olivos Beach Resort in Adeje (Costa Adeje), you'll be a 4-minute walk from Fanabe Beach and 13 minutes by foot from El Duque Beach. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hotel Mirador Papagayo By Livvo
address: C/ Las Palmas, 5, 35570 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: The 4-star Iberostar Papagayo Resort offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Lanzarote. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Take advantage of the hotel's safety deposit boxes, bicycle rental, restaurant, salon, elevator. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer air conditioning, balcony/terrace, mini bar, television, shower to ensure a restful night. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as spa, massage, steamroom, water sports (non-motorized), fitness center. Convenience and comfort makes Iberostar Papagayo Resort the perfect choice for your stay in Lanzarote.Agoda

name: Elba Lanzarote Royal Village Resort
address: Avenida Faro Pechiguera, 1, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Set in Playa Blanca, Lanzarote, and designed as a typical Lanzarote town, Elba Lanzarote Royal Village Resort is located a 15-minute walk from Flamingo Beach. This property offers free WiFi throughout. This complex offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite LED TV, safe, minibar, coffee and tea service, and fan. The private bathroom includes a spacious shower, hairdryer, and magnifying mirror. There are 4 restaurants on site, with options of a la cartè menu and buffet options. A pool bar is also available to all guests. The hotel has several pools, including waterfalls and a children's area, as well as a solarium with sun beds. There are several on-site activities such as football, tennis, and volleyball, including a gym with yoga, Pilates, and Zumba lessons. There is also a spa with different treatment options and services. Playa Blanca is a 5-minute drive from Elba Lanzarote Royal Village Resort. Timanfaya National Park is 10 km away. Lanzarote Airport is 28 km from the property.

name: Gran Melia Palacio de Isora
address: Avenida Los Océanos, s/n, Alcalá, 38686 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: With its privileged Oceanfront location, this spectacular Design Hotel offers stunning views of the island La Gomera and Mount Teide. It is perfectly integrated in the South west coast of Tenerife, in the fishing village Alcala, Guia de Isora. The resort is at five minutes car distance from the beautiful Los Gigantes cliffs, while offering an inspiring proposal to live magic moments and new sensations. Highlights are the impressive colonial Plaza with fountains and chill-out corners and the huge sea water lagoon infinity pool. In addition various fresh water pools, including a pool only for adults, a family pool and a separate childrens pool, as well as the exclusive RedLevel pool. 6 Restaurants, 6 Bars, Yhi Spa with thermal circuit and Yhi Moves, a 24 hours fitness centre. The resort also offers a programme of life enriching activities, professional animation, tennis and paddle courts, archery, miniclub and subtropical gardens. The glorious room facilities are all very spacious with beautiful garden and ocean views and a minimum of 48sqm with private terrace of balcony. The exclusive RedLevel Demi Suites and Oceanfront Garden Villas offer an even superior level of luxury and personalised service, for adults only.priceline.com

name: Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur
address: C/ Roque Nublo, 1, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: This colonial-style hotel on the Costa Adeje features a luxurious spa and beautiful views of the Atlantic Ocean. It offers 5 swimming pools, surrounded by sun terraces and gardens. The elegant rooms at the Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur have a balcony and sea views. They include an interactive flat-screen TV, and a separate hydromassage shower and bath. Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur includes the Nammu Spa with thermal circuits. Massage and beauty treatments are also available. Duque Beach is just 500 metres from the hotel and there is also a fitness centre on-site. Bicycle and car rental can be organised for guests. There are 2 restaurants at the Vincci La Plantación del Sur, one serves creative Canarian cuisine using local produce; the second one, is specialised in charcoal-grilled meat. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. There is also a bar. Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur is 20 minutes’ by car from Reina Sofía Airport.

name: Hotel Floresta
address: Calle Mercurio, 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Hotel Floresta offers spacious apartments located 200 metres from Lanzarote’s Playa de los Pocillos Beach. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool and tennis courts. The apartments are modern and practical with a seating area and air conditioning. They can accommodate up to 2 adults and 2 children. Guests can enjoy a restaurant and bar at Floresta apartments Lanzarote, as well as a terrace to enjoy meals and drinks outside. There are also gardens, play areas for children and an entertainment programme for all ages.

name: Be Live Experience Lanzarote Beach
address: Plaza Del Janubio, 2, 35508 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Overlooking Costa Teguise Beach, in Lanzarote, Be Live Experience Lanzarote Beach Hotel offers a gym, and outdoor pool with loungers. Modern, air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen TV, a private balcony or terrace, and seating area. The spacious, bright rooms have a safe and work desk. They are stylishly decorated and feature tiled floors. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries. This hotel has an à la carte restaurant and a poolside snack bar The Half Board service does not include drinks. The Be Live Experience Lanzarote Beach Hotel offers table tennis, air hockey and billiards. You can play also squash and there are archery and aerobics classes. The hotel features a 24-hour reception. Free parking is available nearby and Costa Teguise Golf Course is a 10-minute drive away. Reservations of 9 or more rooms may be subject to supplements and special conditions.

name: Hotel Melia Bilbao
address: Lehendakari Leizaola, 29, 48001 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Next to the Bilbao Estuary and just a few metres from the iconic Guggenheim Museum and the Euskalduna Palace, our 5-star hotel is the ideal place to relax and savour true Basque gastronomy. A modern hotel, designed by the prestigious architect Ricardo Legorreta and paying homage to the work of the Basque sculptor Eduardo Chillida. Travel to Bilbao and live a comprehensive experience. Meliá Bilbao, with its elegant avant-garde architecture, provides comfortable rooms and suites with fantastic views. Enjoy the Aizian Restaurant serving the most delicious classics of Basque cuisine with local and organic produce, and end your day in our Wellness Centre equipped with a gym, sauna and semi-covered swimming pool with heated water and mountain views. And if you are travelling for work, you can hold all kinds of meetings and events in our meeting rooms."

name: Gf Fañabe
address: Avda de Bruselas 13, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Situated 500 metres from Fañabe Beach in Costa Adeje, Tenerife, GF Fañabe has a large year-round outdoor pool and sun terrace. The colourful rooms have air conditioning and balconies. GF Fañabe has a basketball court and mini golf. The wellness centre offers massages, sauna and hot tub. Two more pools can be found on the roof terrace. There is also a separate area for naturists. There is a kids’ club and an entertainment team that organizes a range of daytime and night time activities. A pool for children is also available. The GF Fañabe’s restaurant offers a varied buffet with show cooking and regular themed dinners. The informal pool bar serves light meals and cocktails, while the hall bar offers live music. Free WiFi is also provided.

name: Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas
