address: Calle Landa Golf, 1, 38650 Arona, Tenerife
description: Set in magnificent tropical gardens, 1 km from water park Siam Park, the colonial-style Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas features 3 outdoor pools. It offers a free shuttle bus to the beach, a 20-minute walk away. Bright, spacious apartments and suites have air-conditioning, and living room with a TV and sofa bed. Private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. All apartments and suites have a dining area and kitchenette with a fridge, microwave, kettle and coffee maker. Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas has a restaurant, and the snack bar overlooks the pools. A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered, and there is a mini-market on-site. Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas features a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. There is parking on-site.

name: Gran Oasis Resort
address: Meandro, 3, Golf las Américas, 38650 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Gran Oasis Resort is a luxury aparthotel, set next to Las Américas Golf Course. Set in gardens, this complex has a large outdoor swimming pool and views of the Atlantic Ocean. The hotel is set between Playa de Las Américas and Los Cristianos. The nearest beach is less than 2km away. The Oasis resort offers a bus service to the beach and Siam Park. The Gran Oasis has comfortable, bright apartments with one or 2 bedrooms. They all have a kitchenette, air conditioner and satellite TV. The complex has a bar and a restaurant. There is a 24-hour reception in the hotel, offering currency exchange, car rental. There is also a tour desk and a small supermarket. The rooms have air conditioning.

name: Parque la Paz
address: Luis Díaz de Losada, 2, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Hotel Parque La Paz Tenerife is located just 150 metres from the Playa de las Americas. Situated in the resort centre, it offers free parking. The apartments are practical and light, with a living room and a bedroom. They also have a kitchenette and a terrace. All apartments have a TV and safe. The Parque La Paz complex has a large freeform swimming pool, plus a small one for children. It also has a large area for sunbathing. You can find plenty to choose from in the hotel’s buffet restaurant. The hotel also organises occasional poolside barbeques. Drinks can be found in the bar lounge or poolside bar. Playa de las Americas is a popular area in the south of Tenerife. Parque La Paz is surrounded by shopping centres, restaurants, bars, parks and gardens, and entertainment.

name: Royal Hideaway Corales Suites - by Barceló Hotel Group
address: Avenida Virgen de Guadalupe 21, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Spacious and modern apartment style Deluxe Suites with 1 2 or 3 bedrooms for all guests. Terrace with ocean views and many also have a private pool.Family friendly.Wide gastronomy offer in exclusive restaurants.1.000 m2 Spa and Wellness Centre 16 yearsBarcelo.com

name: Checkin Concordia Playa
address: Avda. Fam. Betancourt y Molina, 32, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Gaze out over the mountains or the Atlantic Ocean from your own spacious room in this modern holiday hotel, located in Tenerife’s charming resort of Puerto de la Cruz. Choose between spending your day on the magnificent local beaches or beside the Concordia Playa’s own outdoor swimming pool. You can also head to the nearby saltwater pools of Lago Martiánez, one of the works of the famous Canarian artist, Cesar Manrique. Start each day with breakfast in the Concordia Playa’s stylish, modern restaurant. Here you can also dine on buffet lunches and dinner, before heading out to enjoy the vibrant local nightlife.

name: Gran Tacande Wellness & Relax Costa Adeje
address: Alcalde Walter Paetzmann, Adeje, Tenerife
description: Located on Duque Beach, Gran Tacande Wellness & Relax Costa Adeje overlooks the island of La Gomera. Set around 2 outdoor swimming pools, this luxurious hotel offers a spa and rooms with balconies. The Gran Tacande has bright, attractive décor and spacious rooms. with views of the surrounding mountains or the hotel gardens. Some also have sea views. Gold Level rooms feature access to San Sebastian Exclusive Plaza private area, including an infinity pool and a whirlpool with 8 seats. The Zurrón Buffet Restaurant serves International and themed cuisine, while the Bocana Beach Club specialises in Mediterranean dishes. Both have terraces offering ocean views. The Gran Tacande also has a cocktail bar on the rooftop, the Azotea Sunset Bar. The hotel's spa offers hydrotherapy, massage and a range of beauty treatments with an extra cost. There is also a gym with free access and a hairdresser’s. The surrounding Playa de Fañabe resort has a selection of shops and bars. Costa Adeje Golf Resort is 15 minutes’ drive from the Gran Tacande.

name: Royal Sun Resort
address: C/ Los Geranios, 16, 38683 Los Gigantes, Tenerife
description: Set by Los Gigantes Cliffs, Royal Sun Resort Tenerife features outdoor swimming pools with fantastic panoramic views of the coast. The resort offers stylish apartments with private, furnished terraces. Each apartment at Royal Sun Resort includes a lounge area with sofas and flat-screen satellite TV. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, microwave and dishwasher, and the bathroom has a circular bath tub and free toiletries. By the pool is Oasis Abraxas bar, and the resort also has a range of other bars with live entertainment, as well as the buffet restaurant Regency and the à la carte restaurant Aqua. Royal Sun Los Gigantes has a gym and a squash court. Safes, a laundry service and Wi-Fi internet are available at an extra cost. Staff can provide tourist information and help arrange car rental or airport transfers. Royal Sun Apartments Los Gigantes is 1.5 km from both Los Gigantes Harbour and Puerto de Santiago.

name: Globales Tamaimo Tropical
address: C/ La Hondura, s/n - Puerto Santiago, 38683 Puerto de Santiago, Tenerife
description: Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a spa tub or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. This apartment also features complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and laundry facilities.#Optional fees: The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Late check-out fee: EUR 20 (subject to availability) An in-room safe is available for an additional fee The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Policies: Cash transactions at this property cannot exceed EUR 2500, due to national regulations. For further details, please contact the property using information in the booking confirmation. Special instructions: Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check in from: 2:00 PM. Check in to: midnight. Check out: 11:00 AM.Expedia

name: Gf Isabel
address: Avda. de Moscu 2, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: GF Isabel offers 2 outdoor heated pools and charming low-rise apartments and bungalows, with views of the swimming pools, sea or mountains. Fañabe Beach is 600 metres away. Rooms at GF Isabel have a balcony, while bungalows have a terrace or garden.They all include a living-dining area, kitchen and TV. Other facilities available include a swimming pool for children with slides, and a poolside bar. Guests can buy groceries in the Isabel’s mini market, or enjoy meals from the buffet restaurant. The complex also has a poolside bar and stylish lounge bar. GF Isabel offers a children’s playground, and the entertainment staff organize daily activities. There is also a 24-hour reception with a free WiFi zone. Situated in Tenerife’s Costa Adeje, the Isabel complex is surrounded by bars and shops. Playa de las Américas is 4 km away, and regular bus services stop nearby.

name: Tagoro Family & Fun Costa Adeje
address: Galicia, 3, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Tagoro Family & Fun Costa Adeje is located in a quiet, residential area of Costa Adeje, in south-west Tenerife. Surrounded by gardens, this all-inclusive resort offers 4 outdoor pools, 2 for adults and 2 for children. Rooms feature a private balcony or terrace. Set in Canary-style buildings of no more than 3 storeys, the modern rooms feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each one comes with a private bathroom with hairdryer. Free WiFi is available in all areas. The Camelot Kids Club features 4 areas, including a ball pond, an interactive zone with Playstations, flat-screen TVs and proyectors, a mini-court for sports, and a crafts area for coloring and other manual activities. Tagoro Family & Fun Costa Adeje has tennis courts and a wide range of activities for both adults and children. The buffet restaurant serves a range of international dishes, and there are themed dinner evenings with show cooking. The property also features a snack bar and a pool bar. The property is just a 10-minute walk from Fañabé Beach, which also offers a free bus service. Gran Sur Shopping Centre is right next to the resort.

name: Alua Tenerife
address: C. Antonio Ruiz Alvarez 7, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Alua Tenerife is 300 metres from Playa Jardín and 10 minutes’ walk from Puerto de la Cruz. It has 2 outdoor pools a children and an adult one, a buffet restaurant and a free pitch and putt golf course. Guests have access to an indoor pool, sauna and hot tub for an extra charge. Facilities also include gym, tennis and squash courts. The establishment offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: - personalized check-in and check-out, access to My Favorite Club Lounge with snacks and drinks, - access to exclusive areas - and welcome bottle of sparkling wine and a letter from the General Manager at check-in. Each room comes with a fridge, balcony or terrace and satellite TV. A safe, cot or extra bed are available on request. Air conditioning is available during certain hours of the day throughout the summer months. Free WiFi is available in rooms. There is a small on-site shopping centre including a supermarket. There is a children’s play area and a games room. There is a bus station 15 minutes’ walk away in Puerto de la Cruz offering services to other parts of the island.

name: Bahia Principe Sunlight Tenerife
address: Idafe Urb Playa Paraiso, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Featuring outdoor pools, sun terraces and on-site restaurants, Bahia Principe Tenerife is set on the Costa Adeje coast, 10 minutes’ drive from Adeje town and Costa Adeje Golf Club. The property includes an on-site gym, tennis courts, spa and children’s playground. You will also find entertainment options such as karaoke. Air-conditioned rooms come with a private balcony and TV. They each have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Playa de las Americas is a 20-minute drive away, and there you will find a range of shops and dining options. Tenerife Sur Airport can also be reached in 20 minutes’ drive.

name: Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel
address: Urbanizacion Golf Del Sur, 38620 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel is situated on Tenerife and provides 5-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi. Popular amenities, such as a sauna and a swimming pool, make for an enjoyable stay in San Miguel de Abona. The hotel treats guests to a variety of recreational facilities, such as billiards, a playground and Swimming pool. For those travelling with children Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel offers a games room and a kids pool. Rooms have a modern décor, air-conditioning and a refrigerator. They come with tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and an in-room dining area. Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel provides a variety of places to dine, including Golden Buffet and Piano Bar. Eateries at the hotel include Cakes & Bakes Café and Spice Garden. A selection of dining options can also be found in the area. Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel has easy access to Amarilla Golf and Country Club. For guests with a car, parking is available and Granadilla de Abona is a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Playa Sur Tenerife
address: Gaviota,36, 38612 El Médano, Tenerife
description: The Hotel Playa Sur Tenerife is located in El Médano, on the first line of the longest natural beach in Tenerife and only 10 minutes from Tenerife Sur Airport It has a seawater pool and a pleasant solarium with Balinese beds, free WIFI in all the facilities and free private parking. The 24-hour reception provides tourist information, car rental and excursion services Buffet restaurant is open for breakfast from 08:00 – 10:00 and offers a wide variety of hot and cold options. It also has an à la carte restaurant that offers specialties of Mediterranean gastronomy, such as paella and fish. The rooms are simple, some with sea views, have a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries, flat-screen TV, telephone, safe and balcony The surrounding area is ideal for windsurfing, kitesurfing, cycling and hiking. The hotel has a bicycle room and surfboxes to store surf equipment safely. Dogs up to 10kg are welcome. Please book a Superior Double room and always check availability with the hotel before booking

name: Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife
address: Avenida JM Galván Bello, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Situated in San Miguel de Abona, 1.5 km from Playa de San Blas, Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife features accommodation with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and free WiFi. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, karaoke and a shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Popular points of interest near Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife include Playa Grande, Playa San Miguel de Abona and Golf del Sur. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: Roca Nivaria Gran Hotel
address: Av. Adeje 300, 38678 Adeje, Tenerife
description: This luxurious 5-star hotel is situated on Costa Adeje, overlooking Playa Paraiso Beach. It features a spa area and a heated infinity pool with stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean. The modern rooms at Adrián Hoteles Roca Nivaria include air conditioning and satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. The hotel has tennis and archery facilities. A hot tub, mud bath and a range of beauty treatments are also offered. Guests have access RoniAventura, the hotel's water and adventure park, which includes 2 pools, 4 slides, climbing walls and suspension bridges. Adrián Hoteles Roca Nivaria features a buffet restaurant and 2 à la carte restaurants, serving Italian and Spanish cuisine. There is also a poolside bar.

name: Sol Arona Tenerife
address: Avenida Juan Carlos I, 25, 38640 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: Sol Arona Tenerife lies 200 metres from the beach of Los Cristianos, in Tenerife. It features a large outdoor pool with sun loungers and rooms with balconies, most with sea views. A safe is available in all rooms for an extra charge. Children can enjoy their own swimming pool and activities in a playground such as climbing and the superjumper. Meanwhile, parents can enjoy a session in the gym or simply sunbathing on the sun terrace. At the end of the day the family can come together to share a meal in the buffet restaurant before enjoying the nightly entertainment. Tenerife South Airport is less than 20 minutes´ drive from Sol Arona Tenerife.

name: Parque Vacacional Eden
address: Calle Francia 8, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Parque Vacacional Eden is situated in a quiet area of Puerto de la Cruz. It offers modern accommodation set in 12000 m² of beautiful gardens with 4 swimming pools. All of the studios and apartments have a kitchenette, TV, balcony or terrace and telephone. Wi-Fi and a safe are available for an extra charge. The Eden complex’s swimming pools include a children's pool, a nudist pool and a heated indoor pool. There is a tennis court, giant chess set, mini golf, table tennis and billiards. The Parque Vacacional Eden also has a sauna and there is free Wi-Fi in some public areas. The Eden’s Guacimara restaurant offers buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner. There are also 2 bars and a café offering panoramic views of the island. The centre of Puerto de la Cruz and the Playa Jardín Beach are both about 15 minutes’ walk away. The Loro Parque animal park is just over 1 km away. There is free onsite parking. A free shuttle bus to the centre runs from Monday to Saturday.

name: Hotel Casa del Sol
address: Finlandia 4, Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: This hotel is one kilometre from the centre of Tenerife’s Puerto de la Cruz. It has a rooftop terrace, with an outdoor pool, which offers views of Mount Teide. Each room at the Hotel Casa del Sol has a TV, a private balcony or terrace, and a fridge. The private bathrooms are equipped with a hairdryer. Use of the safe is available on request for a surcharge. Casa del Sol has a reading room and games room. There are ping pong and the TV lounge has satellite TV with international channels. The hotel has a buffet restaurant, where guests can relax. The 24-hour reception can provide tourist information, and the famous Lagos de Martianez Pools are 10-minute walk away.

name: NH Valencia Las Artes
address: Avenida Instituto Obrero, 28, 46013 Valencia, Valencia
description: The NH Valencia Las Artes hotel is ideally situated close to the Joaquín Sorolla Station and is a 13km bus or car ride from Valencia Airport. It is conveniently located near several attractions including the City of Arts and Sciences, the aquarium and an IMAX cinema. The Palau de les Arts Reina Sofia, the Valencia Cathedral, and Malvarrosa Beach are also all within a 1km to 7km distance and are easily accessible by foot or bus. Both the Central Market and the El Saler Centro Comercial shopping centers are also close by. Each of our 174 comfortable guest rooms have contemporary amenities including room service, free Wi-Fi, and comfortable mattresses. The junior suite has a coffee and tea maker, a sitting area, and sofa for guests who require additional space, not to mention the fantastic view of the opera house. A breakfast buffet is available daily and made-to-order hot dishes are cooked upon request. The elegant NH Valencia Las Artes Restaurant opens for lunch and dinner with its cuisine focused on local Mediterranean fare. A gym with a sauna, a children’s play area, a year-round heated swimming pool, wake up service, and three terraces are additional features for our guests enjoy.NH Hoteles

name: Globales Reina Cristina
address: Paseo De La Conferencia S N, 11207 Algeciras, Andalusia
description: Globales Reina Cristina was originally opened in 1901 and houses ancient ruins, such as parts of an 8th-century Mosque and a Moorish well. It features indoor and outdoor swimming pools. Globales Reina Cristina has welcomed famous visitors, including Winston Churchill and King Juan Carlos I of Spain. It offers elegant rooms with a private balcony, free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV. Surrounded by beautiful gardens, the hotel is situated next to Algeciras Port. The beaches of Tarifa are 20 minutes away by car and free parking is available on site. Facilities at the hotel include 2 tennis courts and a gym. Table tennis are also available. The hotel restaurant serves buffet meals and guests have the option of à la carte dining in the evening, or at lunchtime. There are also 2 bars and a café. Barbecues are organised during the summer months. There is also live music, on occasion. Gibraltar Airport is 35 minutes drive from the property.

name: Hospes Amerigo
address: Rafael Altamira 7, 03002 Alicante, Valencia
description: With beautiful views of Alicante Cathedral and Santa Bárbara Castle, Hospes Amerigo’s free rooftop spa features a sauna, pool and gym. Rooms offer free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. This elegant design hotel is set in a 19th-century Dominican Convent in Alicante’s old town, 300 metres from Postiguet Beach. Hospes Amerigo is within 50 metres of the cathedral and Alicante Town Hall. Stylish room at Hospes Amerigo have high ceilings and large windows. Some rooms feature abstract silk paintings. In summer, guests can enjoy the views from the rooftop lounge bar, situated next to the open-air pool.

name: Hotel Port Alicante City & Beach
address: Avenida Cataluña, 20, 03540 Alicante, Valencia
description: Port Alicante City & Beach is located in Alicante, 800 metres from the beach of San Juan and 10 minutes by car from the city center. This hotel has outdoor swimming pools, gym and sauna. All rooms at the Port Alicante City & Beach have air conditioning and full private bathroom with hairdryer. They also have a desk, a kettle water, safe and satellite TV. The hotel offers outdoor paid parking, free WiFi in public areas, It also has a garden with a playground and a children's pool. The restaurant offers a buffet service and serves Mediterranean cuisine, specializing in paella and other rice dishes. There is also a cafe/bar and a poolside bar, open during all year round. A bus and tram stop is 400 metres from this hotel. The field of golf de Alicante is located 600 meters away. Near the hotel there are many bars, restaurants and shops. The nearest airport is Alicante Airport, 25 km from the property. NEW- Opening of the new Sky Bar Boga on the hotel's rooftop. Prior reservation is recommended, before arrival at the hotel, to the email: portalicante@porthotels.es Live a unique experience and enjoy the perfect fusion between exquisite cocktails, high-class cuisine and live music! We will wait for you!

name: Melia Villaitana
address: Avda. Alcalde Eduardo Zaplana, 7, Alicante, Valencia
description: Located less than 3 km from Benidorm, Hotel Villaitana offers a luxurious spa area, outdoor swimming pools and an artificial beach. Set on 2 golf courses designed by Jack Nicklaus, it has great views of Gran Bahía Bay. Melia Villaitana was designed in the form of a traditional Mediterranean village. Each of the large, air-conditioned rooms comes with a private balcony or terrace. They also have satellite TV, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Villaitana also dedicates some of its areas to The Level exclusive rooms and services, where The Level guests have private access to The Level Lounge with open bar and private buffet, daily cocktails, press and concierge services and pre-arrival services. Rooms include sound bar, flat-screen TV with satellite channels, coffee machine and turndown service, among other services. The Level rooms also offer some privileged views over the area. The Villaitana’s wellness centre features a gym free of charge, sauna and water circuit with thermal baths. A range of beauty and relaxation treatments is also available. The resort has its own tennis and paddle tennis courts, a seasonal children's playground for children over 5 years and a club. Villaitana Hotel has 6 restaurants and a snack bar. Easily accessible from the AP-7 Motorway, Hotel Villaitana offers easy road access to the Terra Mítica Theme Park and Terra Natura Nature Reserve. Alicante is a 20-minute drive away. Alicante Airport is 50 km away and Valencia Airport is 134 km away.

name: Amor de Helene
address: Tomas Elis Yusti,4, 03540 Alicante, Valencia
description: Situated in Alicante, less than 1 km from San Juan Beach, Amor de Helene features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. Boasting a bar, the hostel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.3 km from Cantalars Cove and around 1.5 km from Cantalars Cove. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and room service. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also feature free WiFi, while some rooms also boast pool view. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Amor de Helene. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Guests at Amor de Helene will be able to enjoy activities in and around Alicante, like hiking. Alicante Golf is 2.3 km from the hostel, while Alicante Train Station is 8.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alicante–Elche Miguel Hernández, 26 km from Amor de Helene, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Catalonia Santa Justa
address: Jose Laguillo 8, 41003 Seville, Andalusia
description: Catalonia Santa Justa is located a short walk from Seville's historic centre, and just 650 metres from Santa Justa AVE Train Station. It offers a sun terrace, rooftop swimming pool, and a hot tub. Rooms at the Santa Justa hotel feature parquet floors and modern décor. They have wooden furniture and satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. Free WiFi is available. The Santa Justa has a bar and an international restaurant with a covered patio. The hotel's 24-hour reception offers currency exchange and car rental. The hotel 1.2 km from the Giralda and Seville Cathedral. The nearby Santa Catalina area has museums, shops and tapas bars.

name: Hotel Fernando III
address: San Jose 21, 41004 Seville, Andalusia
description: Hotel Fernando III is in Seville’s historic Santa Cruz district. It offers free WiFi, a roof terrace with city views and a seasonal swimming pool, open from June to September. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at the Fernando are comfortable and offer attractive, contemporary design. Some rooms have balconies and offer city views. The hotel’s restaurant serves both Andalusian dishes and European cuisine, in additional to traditional tapas and wines. There is also daily breakfast service. The hotel can also provide tourist information and a ticket service. Additional facilities include function rooms suitable for conferences, banquets and weddings. Hotel Fernando III is a short walk from Seville Cathedral and the Giralda Tower. The Alcazar Gardens are just 2 streets away, while Seville Train Station is also nearby.

name: Gran Hotel Luna de Granada
address: Plaza Manuel Cano, 2 (Esquina Arabial), 18004 Granada, Andalusia
description: Location This hotel is situated approximately 1 km from the city centre that offers many shops and a lively nightlife scene. Restaurants, bars and links to the public transport network are to be found in the vicinity and the nearest beach is some 60 km away. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 253 accommodation units. Guests can reach the upper floors by lift. Services such as a cloakroom, a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant and a café. Shopping facilities are available. A TV room is also among the amenities at the establishment. Guests arriving by car can park their vehicles in the garage or car park. Guests can also use the bicycle storage facilities. Additional services include a babysitting service, medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Rooms All accommodation units feature central heating and a bathroom. A safe and a minibar also feature. Internet access, a telephone, a TV and a radio are provided for guests' convenience. A hairdryer can also be found in each of the bathrooms. Sports/Entertainment A refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool can be pleasantly cooling on hot days. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. Leisure options at the establishment include a gym, a spa, a sauna and a hammam, or for a fee, massage treatments. Guests staying at the establishment will find that it offers all of the necessary conditions for a memorable winter holiday. Guests can enjoy sporting activities such as cross-country skiing. Further available options include a kids' club. Meals The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: L'Azure Hotel 4 Sup
address: Calle Esports, 17310 Lloret de Mar, Catalonia
description: L'Azure Hotel 4* Sup is conveniently set in the centre of Lloret de Mar, 3 km from Water World. It offers 2 outdoor swimming pools, a fitness centre, and spa. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the hotel, you will find a Mediterranean restaurant and a buffet restaurant. Other facilities at L'Azure Hotel 4* Sup include an adult-only rooftop terrace with an infinity pool. A splash park for children is also available at the hotel. Lloret Beach is 800 metres from the accommodation, while Santa Clotilde Gardens is 1.8 km away. Girona-Costa Brava Airport is 23 km from the property.

name: Hotel Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa
address: Concilios de Toledo, Toledo, Toledo
description: Set in large gardens, 5 minutes' drive from central Toledo, Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa offers free Wi-Fi, a paying spa, and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Each room has a private balcony. All rooms at the Hotel Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa are air conditioned and spacious. They have wooden floors, a 43-inch flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. The Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa Hotel has a buffet restaurant and an à la carte restaurant, offering seasonal dishes. There is also a poolside bar, a disco and a children’s play area. Available for a supplement, the spa contains a hydrothermal circuit with contrast showers, a sauna and an ice fountain. The Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa is located 5-minute drive from Toledo’s old town, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Buses to the town centre stop 150 metres from the hotel.

name: La Cueva Park
address: Autovia A-382 Jerez-Arcos Km 3.5, 11406 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Situated in the Andalusian countryside just 4 km from Jerez, La Cueva Park offers an outdoor pool and attractive gardens. Each air-conditioned room offers a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The spacious rooms at the Cueva Park Hotel feature wooden floors and plenty of natural light. They all have a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Some include a balcony, and a minibar is available under request. The hotel’s popular Mesón La Cueva restaurant serves Andalusian cuisine, including traditional tapas and specialities. There is also a cafe-snack bar. Cueva Park is next to Jerez Race Track and only 3 km from Jerez Airport. Cadiz and the Costa de la Luz are a 20-minute drive away, via the nearby A 4 and A 382 Motorways. The hotel offers free on-site parking.

name: Crisol Jardines de Córdoba
address: Calle Poeta Alfonso de Bonilla, 3, 14012 Córdoba, Andalusia
description: Set in attractive gardens, the Crisol Jardines de Córdoba offers accommodation in Cordoba with a seasonal outdoor pool, a hot tub and a restaurant. There is free WiFi available throughout. The spacious rooms at the Ayre Córdoba feature classic décor and views of the hotel’s extensive gardens. All rooms have a TV, a safe and a minibar. The poolside Azaire Restaurant, a typical gastronomic space with terrace and volcanic stone, serves a range of Spanish cuisine. The hotel also has a viewing area where you can see panoramic views of the city, as well as an outdoor area for exercising. 2 tennis courts are also available for guests to use on request. The historic centre of Córdoba, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is 4.6 km from the hotel.
